name: "Back to nature": Natuurkampeerterrein 't Heuvelhof, Dranouter/Heuvelland
description:
At Natuurkampeerterrein 't Heuvelhof, in the picturesque village of Dranouter, Piet and co offer various unique places. From old-fashioned bivouacing with your own tent or camper, to an authentic caravan or guest house!

You stay in peace in the orchard, vineyard, hay meadow or (food) bush, on a site of 1.7 hectares, with very spacious camping pitches and a view of the hills of the beautiful Heuvelland.
On the grounds you can walk to the vineyard, the food forest, the wild grove, the sheep pasture, and the natural swimming pool (where you can take a refreshing dip of 5 meters high).
Or enjoy the wood-fired sauna barrel* and/or hot tub*!

Go back to basics with plenty of space and nature around you, make a cozy campfire at your pitch and enjoy the things you don't do at home - based on the 'leave no trace' ethic. The 52m2 tipi tent is available free of charge for guests and offers access to a refrigerator, kettle and electricity for charging a telephone, headlight, etc. You can hide in it from the rain, make a campfire…
Everything is deliberately kept very basic, minimalistic and natural.
You are welcome with your friends, family and/or four-legged friends!

The region is fantastic for walking or cycling! There is a walking junction and a cycling junction on the site, from which many unpaved (walking) routes start. As an avid walker, Piet is happy to help you find a suitable walking route for you.

Within walking or cycling distance you will find several restaurants, cafes, a very culinary butcher, the best bakery, French supermarkets with oysters ... and you can even catch a live performance in the folk music center.
At the weekend we sometimes light the wood oven and you can join us in the evening for a delicious dish or we make pizza or there is the possibility to drink coffee on the terrace and / or have breakfast.

You can only book our guesthouse and the entire tipi via our website. All extra services (electricity, fire bowl, firewood…) can also be BOOKED ON THE SITE and paid in cash without extra service costs!

*The sauna and hot tub must be reserved and paid for on the spot, if available. Sauna, private: €30/1.5 hours (incl. firewood) and hot tub from €60. ATTENTION: ONLY cash payments, NO electronic payment systems!

Be sure to take a look at the many beautiful photos of our past guests at the end of the photo series.

name: Natural spot on a farm in the Fens
description:
Do you want to go green?
We welcome you to its woods for a relaxing holiday in the heart of our nature in the Fagnes.

You can also discover life on the farm every day from 5 pm to 7 pm: milking goats, milking cows, caring for goats and calves, ... all in a friendly and welcoming atmosphere.

name: Overnight stay in the historic Nagold Valley
description:
We offer a place for campers on historical grounds, between the forest and the river, below a castle ruin and an adjacent historical Maierhof.
In the morning it can happen that horses, donkeys or goats stand in front of the tent to greet you.
At night the owls call to go to sleep.
Who loves the pure nature is exactly right with us, because the place is surrounded by a lot of nature / forest.
On request, an overnight stay in the private forest is also possible.
The meadow stretches from the parking lot about 1 km to the forest.




-Water can be fetched from the Nagold River, which runs through our property, or from the yard directly.
-Dining room with table football, pool table, Div. Toys for children can be used & various books/films to borrow (opening hours: 10 a.m. - 9 p.m.)
- Volleyball/ badminton or badminton net available (you have to bring your own accessories)
-Hot drinks, cold drinks, ice cream and eggs (while stocks last) are also offered.
-Trash can available.
- Grill available on request. (Open fireplaces are permitted seasonally due to the risk of fire - alternatively there is a fire barrel)
You would have to bring wood for grilling or collect it in the area.




!!!The additional services offered, as well as the toilet, are in the adjacent historic courtyard!!!

name: Quiet camping on a river in beautiful surroundings
description:
Escape the crowds and enjoy the tranquility of our secluded camping meadow in the middle of nature. With us you can camp back to basics with your tent, caravan or van and be completely off-grid. With a limited number of guests you can enjoy the silence and the beautiful starry sky. Choose your own spot on our site, in the meadow or along the stream. Enjoy almost wild camping, but with the luxury of an outdoor toilet and fire bowl with firewood.

For nature lovers who love comfort and luxury, we also offer a fully equipped Glamping tent. Discover the area with the many cycling and walking routes nearby, and visit the Achelse Kluis. Use our Campspace and experience the ultimate camping experience in Pelt. Book your stay now and enjoy the peace and nature, together with your family and friends!

Activities in the area: Dommel afvaart, curling balls, bicycle rental, bicycle package "Happen and stairs in Pelt".

name: Casual camping in the East Cantons (The Belgian Eifel)
description:
Discover our beautiful camping spot near Sankt Vith, surrounded by fields and nature reserves. Here you can enjoy the peace and nature while cycling, walking or exploring the East Cantons.

Not an experienced camper or no tent of your own? Our Glamping tent offers all the comfort and luxury you need for an unforgettable camping experience in the foothills of the German Eifel and the High Fens!

name: Camping at Grijsberg
description:
Come and enjoy the vast forests here in the Antwerp Kempen. From your camping pitch you have an ideal base for many wonderful walking or cycling trips. If you prefer to enjoy the peace and quiet, you will probably find a nice spot close to or on your camping spot. Ask the owners about the local assets because they are certainly there. For the sporty holidaymaker and/or the quieter, there are many beautiful, interesting places to discover.

On the camping site itself you can find peace and breathe in the wonderful scent of the forest. Would you like an egg and/or a jar of honey or jam for breakfast? Your host and hostess will gladly offer it to you. Most of it comes from our own garden. In the evening you can enjoy the sounds of the forest here: the song thrush with its evening song, a grunting woodcock that flies over and when the campfire is lit you can also hear the tawny owl by the crackling fire. If you have any questions about the possibilities at the camping site, you can always contact the host and hostess.

name: Country house Talander
description:
Come and enjoy the vast regional forests in the Antwerp Kempen. From your camping pitch you have an ideal base for many wonderful hiking or cycling trips. The camping spot is located along the forest where you can leave a few meters away for a walk along walking routes that have been selected for walk of the year 2021, being the bridge walk of 10 km and the grave raven path of 3 km. If you prefer to enjoy the peace and quiet, you will probably find a nice spot close to or at your camping spot itself. Your camping pitch is located in the ecological garden of a Talander vzw country house. Talander vzw is an initiative for people with a disability. In this country house, a companion lives with two people in co-housing, they are happy to be your hosts.

Ask them about the local assets, because they are certainly there. For the sporty holidaymaker and / or the rather quieter, there are many beautiful, interesting nice places to discover.
At the camping spot you can find peace and sniff the wonderful forest scent.
Would you like to enjoy breakfast in the morning? Let your hosts know, for an affordable amount they will be happy to prepare something for you, perhaps with ingredients from their own garden.

In the evening you can enjoy the sounds of the forest here: the song thrush, a grunting woodcock that flies over and when the campfire is lit you can also hear the tawny owl by the crackling fire.
If you have any questions about the possibilities at the camping site, you can always contact the hosts.

name: Flemish Pajottenland swimming pool shower sauna
description:
Charming camping pitch in the green, hybrid swimming pool heated with solar mats and sauna available. Hammocks, swing, petanque .... Within walking distance Liedekerke forest, Krukenburg castle, St. Gertrudis Church, old town hall Ternat.
By bike: Gaasbeek castle, castle route, Gueuze route, MTB trail, ... bicycle highway to Brussels, Aalst, Ninove, Halle, Geraardsbergen (wall of), Ghent

name: A spacious and beautiful spot all for you in the Flemish Ardennes
description:
Behind our garden we have a piece of land of about 1ha. In the appropriate seasons you can enjoy a piece of nature in full growth. Our garden is a source of life with an orchard, a picking garden and fresh vegetables.
You can store your tent on a shady area. You are completely surrounded by greenery. You have your privacy. You are best provided with your own material. There is a fire bowl with a diameter of 1m and an elevation with a grid. There is a woodpile. You can use an outdoor shower with warm water and a compost toilet. In our garden you have the freedom to enjoy the cozy spots. Feel like at home! At the moment my father is building a pizza oven. Who knows you make your own pizza? Mama Mia! We are happy to have a chat when you come camping with us. This way we can help you if necessary or show you around with some tips about the region. There is not much to say about our village itself. We live in the center of the village. Make no mistake, it is not a quiet and isolated place. On the edge of the village, along the Scheldt, there is a beautiful golf course. We live 3 km from Oudenaarde. Oudenaarde, the city of the Tour of Flanders in the middle of the Flemish Ardennes. Would you simply like to come camp or spend the night on your exciting journey on foot or by bike? Ideal!

You are 2 km from Donkvijver. The sympathetic club 'Absolut' where you can Suppen and windsurfer. In THE OUTSIDER you can water ski, wakeboard, climb, swamp courses, etc ... Or are you a sporty cyclist and do you want to brave the classics of De Ronde Van Vlaanderen?
The city of Oudenaarde is worth a visit: historical center, Museum Oudenaarde, historical site of Ename Abbey and Provincial Archaeological Museum, tapestries, .. HIKING: Muziekbos, Kluisbos, GR routes, Burrekenbos, forest 'Ename, Walking through picturesque villages, Elzelles witch route, Hiking with alpacas in Zwalm CYCLING: many cycling routes, Koppenberg, Kwaremont, many mountain bike routes, ... EATING OUT: You will certainly find something suitable in oudenaarde or the surrounding area. There is an abundance on offer.

name: Camping in the yard of a farmhouse in the fruit orchard
description:
Enjoy the wide view with lambs and cows 100 meters away, spot the lighthouses of the Wadden Islands in the evening, swim in the Elfstedenvaart, beautiful sunrise / sunset. Natural location, simple facilities, small-scale but spacious.
We like to let more people enjoy our beautiful place located on the Elfstedenvaart between Harlingen and Leeuwarden. An ideal base for making all kinds of trips from here. We are not a real campsite. You can choose a spot upon arrival. The chickens and cat Mormel will welcome you. You can come camping completely basic; with your own tent, no hot water and no electricity To a luxuriously furnished canvas tent with made beds. All in a beautiful spot in the fruit orchard. There is also room for a small bus camper. Depending on the period, fruit, vegetables and/or herbs are for sale, with a cash box next to it. In Franeker there are supermarkets, (pastry) bakers, butchers, nice fashion shops. A small market on Wednesdays and Saturdays. Don't forget to visit the world famous Planetarium.
10 minutes from Harlingen, 20 minutes to Leeuwarden, If you are on your way to one of the Wadden Islands, it is an ideal stop to spend the night 1 day in advance.

name: Taste our piece of Limburg! Experience the blueberry in Oudsbergen.
description:
The 15 hectare blueberry plantation of the Schrijnwerkers family is located in the Limburg Kempen, at the foot of the Oudsberg in Gruitrode.
The Oudsberg is the highest and largest open drifting dune in Flanders. It rises 85 meters above sea level and is surrounded by beautiful heathlands, forests
and grasslands. Since 1998, the Oudsberg has been recognized as a Flemish nature reserve. At the top you can enjoy a beautiful view. The Oudsberg is also part of the candidacy to become a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Step to the top from the plantation. On foot, by bike or mountain biking: there are plenty of challenges on the edge of the Oudsberg through a varied landscape.
From about mid-July to mid-September you can enjoy a delicious piece of blueberry pie in the cafeteria every day. On some days in the season you can pick your own blueberries.

name: Camping Belarus-1 in the Achterhoek
description:
Campsite in the beautiful Achterhoek, in the countryside between meadows and forests.
Peace, outdoors, birds, rabbits, hares, chickens, etc. Outside area with many estates and castles.

(in the winter months you can use indoor (heated) sanitary facilities)

name: Camping de Torenvalk, a lovely place in the Peel
description:
We have a small charming campsite in the Peel, in front of the door starts a beautiful walk called the "struinpad"
Our campsite is located in a landscaped garden with beautiful paths along small fields and bushes. Hidden in the green is our Vintage caravan "Miss in the green" a beautiful Constructam from 1964, a lovely spot in a corner of the campsite.
Our pipowagen "Poppy" is also located at the campsite, a nice and complete accommodation for two people..
It is wonderful to relax in the evening after an active day with a drink at the fire pit in a cozy campfire place.

name: family camping homestay
description:
Discover the serenity of the countryside and rest in a haven of peace, ideal for a nature campsite. Stay in a green setting, surrounded by fields and forest, perfect for a bucolic walk and an ecological holiday. Take advantage of a rural village with all the conveniences at your fingertips for a relaxing stay in the countryside. The sea and the nearest town are only 10 minutes away by car, providing an ideal location for exploring the surrounding area. Upon your arrival, you will be offered a drink to welcome you.

The enchanting setting:
Immerse yourself in a peaceful and silent environment, where only the chirping of birds enhances the atmosphere. Admire the starry sky and let yourself be lulled by the tranquility of the place in your open-air accommodation. The passage is discreet, preserving the tranquility of your stay. Enjoy breathtaking views of the green fields and the surrounding forest.

The locations of choice:
The site, warm and impeccably maintained, has a slight slope for a unique camping experience. Access is facilitated by a spacious entrance 5 meters long. Share a generous plot of 5795 m2 and choose your location according to your preferences, in the shade or in the sun, taking into account the position of the sun throughout the day. The spacious pitches offer an ideal setting to relax and fully enjoy the surrounding nature.

name: peace, space and nature between beautiful waters in a rustic polder
description: In the rustic polders of East Flakkee, near the town of Achthuizen, time has stood still and tourism is in its infancy. In daily life we work in (elderly) care. That daily bustle washes off us when we get home. We live in the middle of this special environment in our farmhouse. We have partly set up the land, 1.5 hectares, as a mini camping site for camper, caravan and tent. There are also 2 gypsy wagons for rent. And if you wake up in the morning to the call of the harrier that startles the roe deer while the carp in the creek that meanders past our mini campsite through a nature reserve and potato fields, you will fully experience nature, the peace and the space. One grabs his chair and goes to enjoy the rising sun. The other came by boat to go fishing on one of the large waters and a cooling dip a few minutes from our mini campsite. The accessibility of cities for shopping is good, as is a cultural visit to places such as Willemstad or Zierikzee. And our place is also a good base for beach lovers. In +/- 20 minutes you are on the beaches of the North Sea, without traffic jams!

name: Nature camping on the Markermeer - camping & accommodations
description:
Welcome to our mini campsite at 800 m from the Markermeer. Originally, this was an organic market garden with a nature campsite in the West Frisian village of Venhuizen, near the IJsselmeer dike between Hoorn and Enkhuizen. Unfortunately, due to circumstances, we have no harvest this year and the market garden has gone wild. Still, it remains a nice place where you can do whatever you want.

At our mini campsite you can pitch your tent, caravan or motorhome on one of the spacious pitches, in peace and quiet and surrounded by greenery. No own camping equipment? No problem, there are various accommodations for rent, such as a retro caravan with an unobstructed view.

There are various play equipment for children, such as a playhouse, trampolines, slides, sandpit and various go-karts and tractors. Many chickens and roosters live on the market garden, but also two pigs, cats (to snuggle with), dogs and of course many types of birds and insects. Please note that the sanitary building is a short walk away.

We strive for biodynamic horticulture based on strengthening natural growth with attention to soil fertility and diversity in crop cultivation. We see nature as a connected whole, in which the influence of climate, soil fertility, water pollution, biodiversity and air quality, among other things, is a determining factor. That also means that it is not a 'tight and tidy' campsite. The grass is uneven, which may make it difficult if you have difficulty walking. The garden is overgrown and weeds and weeds grow consciously for optimal soil fertility and biodiversity. The roughness is a place for special plants and insects. We are happy to tell you more about biodynamic horticulture.

Environment
Enjoy the tranquility, between the greenery, agriculture and the wide view. Our campsite is located 800 m from the Markermeer, with two beaches. The depth of the water is about 1 meter up to several hundred meters, which is ideal for children, and the water temperature is just a few degrees more.

Of course, the area is perfect for walking and cycling along the dike and through the beautiful polder landscape. We are located directly on the popular LF cycling and walking route; the Zuiderzee route.

6 km away is the historic town of Enkhuizen with, among other things, the Zuiderzee Museum, Sprookjeswonderland, playground 'Kindervreugd' and the ferry to Stavoren and Urk. VOC city of Hoorn is 11 km away and Medemblik is 18 km away.
Various shops can be found in both Venhuizen and Bovenkarspel, both within 3 km of the TuinGoed.
There is also a nice outdoor swimming pool in Venhuizen/Hem: 't Hemmerven and bicycle rental Rijwielhuis Hem.

name: Sunset on the green field
description:
Welcome to our nature campsite

On our 2500 square meter property we offer three pitches for tents, mobile homes and caravans. You stand on our meadow with an unobstructed view of the Feldmark and a fantastic sunset. If it rains, you can use a spacious covered area for cooking and chilling. On our meadow there is a composting toilet and drinking water. For the long nights we provide you with two fire bowls and firewood free of charge.


There are two natural pools very close by, which you can easily reach on foot or by bike. You should also definitely visit the fairytale town of Buxtehude by bike. Regesbostel is the perfect starting point for day trips with children to Hamburg (50 km), Bremen (80 km) and the Lüneburg Heath (30 km). In the evening, our green meadow offers pure relaxation (-:

name: Natural camping spot in our horse paradise
description:
Come camping off-grid in our food forest and horse paradise with your camper van or tent, or rent one of our brand new hikers' cabins.

At our natural stable we not only house horses in our beautiful horse paradise, but we also offer space for guests who want to experience nature. You can camp here with a lot of privacy, with a view of stray horses. Located in the outskirts of Lunteren on a dead end road, you can still enjoy real silence on our property. No roads or trains. Most of the noise comes from a family of little owls, the neighbor's cows and our horses. Sounds to dream away..

We offer a limited number of nature camping spots and hikers' huts. In the middle of the meadow, in the silence between the horses, or in our yard close to the sanitary house. With us you decide where you prefer to stay.

For campers we have space all year round on the pavement in our yard. In dry conditions, campers can also choose an off-grid spot on our camping meadow.

Separately in our yard is a neat sanitary building with 2 sanitary units. In the low season it is possible to rent a sanitary unit as private sanitary.

Our fire pit and picnic tables are at your disposal and our 2.5ha site gives enough space to find a place to enjoy the silence in privacy and to pick wild blackberries and apples in the summer season.

Wekeromse Zand is 2 kilometers away from our site. The Lunterse neighborhood forest is also easily accessible on foot and by bicycle. The entrance to the Hoge Veluwe and the Kröller-Müller museum is 10 minutes away by car.

The village centers of Lunteren, Barneveld and Wekerom are all about 4 km away from us.

Would you like to bring your own horse?
We have 4 off-grid tent pitches available, each with a private meadow right next to it where you can house your horse (or 2 horses together). This way you sleep right next to your horse and you experience a very unique holiday with and next to your horse.

name: Small campsite in monastery garden, Ellezelles, Hainaut
description:
If you're looking for an alternative to a campsite, look no further! 'Camping in Wallonia' takes on a whole new meaning at our monastery campsite in Belgium.

With the keywords experience, move, admire, refuel your stay in the beautiful and vast domain becomes a swirling cocktail of nature, relaxation, tranquillity and authenticity.

We offer camping spots on a 2.5 hectare park. In total we allow 12 camping 'bubbles'.
The sanitary facilities consist of 6 toilets with sinks (rainwater).
You can find 6 showers on the first floor of the former monastery school.
We advise you to bring a length extension cable if you would like to enjoy electricity.

Since recently, we also offer an overnight stay in our fully renovated and authentic gypsy caravan on the monastery domain.
Facilities available include: Toilet, shower, BBQ, campfire, laundry, basic dishwashing corner, dogs allowed. An enclosed horse pasture is available for those who want to go out for a weekend to explore our beautiful region with their own horse.

name: Relax you're on Camp Time
description:
This mini campsite is located in the rural wooded area of De Mortel in the municipality of Gemert Bakel. With beautiful walking and cycling routes in the immediate vicinity.

In addition to the blossom or other beautiful flowers, there are also many birds, butterflies and bees that come to sniff. The falcons hanging in the air and in the evening the bats flying around. Then you can hear the woodpecker ticking and the rooster crowing. Start the morning with a farm-fresh egg from our chickens. And then there's a big rabbit to pet. Peace and space around us, you are in the middle of the countryside but still close to the villages. Barbecuing is allowed and there is also a campfire place.

The Stippelberg nature reserve is our backyard. Hiking in the area is very beautiful and fun. Also many cycling routes that you can start from the campsite.

With the motorcycle out, you are in Germany or Belgium in no time, plenty of options for a nice ride.

In the nearby villages of Gemert, Bakel, Deurne, Helmond you can enjoy the many terraces on the beautiful squares.

name: Camping where the Heidschnucken sleep...
description:
Farm camping in the Eifel

Quiet meadow close to nature with a view of our Heidschnuckenweide. The farm is on the outskirts of Wachendorf, at the foot of the northern Eifel and is a wonderful starting point for relaxation in nature. With us you will find space on a spacious meadow with an unobstructed view of the landscape, a fire in the evening, products from our Heidschnucke and chilled drinks. We look forward to you!

The listed Vierkanthof in the Eifel is home to our manufactory for tuned chimes. Here you get an insight into the production of the handmade chimes.

Our factory shop is also located in the yard. We sell our own ringing products as well as gongs and singing bowls, selected gifts, a diverse range of poinsettias and products from our Heidschnucke sheep.

More offers:
- Washer/dryer per load: €5
- Waste disposal only possible with waste separation (residual waste 3€)

If you have any other tips, feel free to ask us!

name: Quiet place, spacious meadow or private wellness close to De Maasduinen
description:
Our campspace offers sheltered spots for a tent and spacious areas for campers! Guests can use our wood-fired shower for free, and from October to April the private wellness area with sauna and wood-fired hot tub is also available! You can certainly come to us in winter for relaxation in nature! If you want to come on horseback, you are welcome to stable it in our paddock!

The Maasduinen National Park in Limburg is within walking distance and is a beautiful area for hikers, mountain bikers and horse riders. Rental bicycles are available on request and for a special breakfast in the morning you can even pick up the eggs of our chickens!

name: Quiet meadow in the middle of the forest near a nature reserve
description:
Near the mountain bike route Herentals / Kasterlee.
The Tikkebroeken nature reserve. Direct access to forest & hiking trails.

Nice lawn, surrounded by the forest. Back to basics - for people who want nothing for a while.

Pets allowed.

No plumbing.

name: Roei, barbecue, fiets en ontspan op onze kleine natuurcamping in het Rietveld!
description:
Be welcome at our small-scale nature campsite in Hazerswoude village. We have an Araucaria nursery and are also delighted to receive travelers at the camping pitches.

The landscape around us is typically Dutch: green polder meadows, windmills, waterways and lots of water birds. We are surrounded by waterways and have rowing boats to discover the area from the water. We also have bicycles available to visit the polders, mills and surrounding farms. If you visit us by car, the cities of Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague and Utrecht can all be reached in 40 minutes. Smaller cities such as Gouda and Leiden are an hour by bike from us.

There are toilet and shower cubicles on the campsite for every two camping pitches.

There is a large shared space in the greenhouse where you can quietly read a book, use board games, do yoga or just relax.

name: Quiet place, spacious meadow or private wellness close to De Maasduinen
description:
Our campspace offers sheltered spots for a tent and spacious areas for campers! Guests can use our wood-fired shower for free, and from October to April the private wellness area with sauna and wood-fired hot tub is also available! You can certainly come to us in winter for relaxation in nature! If you want to come on horseback, you are welcome to stable it in our paddock!

The Maasduinen National Park in Limburg is within walking distance and is a beautiful area for hikers, mountain bikers and horse riders. Rental bicycles are available on request and for a special breakfast in the morning you can even pick up the eggs of our chickens!

name: Quiet camping on a river in beautiful surroundings
description:
Escape the crowds and enjoy the tranquility of our secluded camping meadow in the middle of nature. With us you can camp back to basics with your tent, caravan or van and be completely off-grid. With a limited number of guests you can enjoy the silence and the beautiful starry sky. Choose your own spot on our site, in the meadow or along the stream. Enjoy almost wild camping, but with the luxury of an outdoor toilet and fire bowl with firewood.

For nature lovers who love comfort and luxury, we also offer a fully equipped Glamping tent. Discover the area with the many cycling and walking routes nearby, and visit the Achelse Kluis. Use our Campspace and experience the ultimate camping experience in Pelt. Book your stay now and enjoy the peace and nature, together with your family and friends!

Activities in the area: Dommel afvaart, curling balls, bicycle rental, bicycle package "Happen and stairs in Pelt".

name: Village idyll in the Harz Mountains, near Wernigerode, top for cycling and hiking tours in the mountains
description:
On our private property in the village, just a few kilometers from the Harz Mountains, we offer you a quiet spot to spend the night or linger in a tent.
We have a lot of space and you can choose your own place around our house when you arrive. Please note: We have received many inquiries from people who would like to come to us with campers. Unfortunately we do not have space for campers or caravans directly on the property. If you want to spend the night in your vehicle, you can park it under our carport, right next to the property. However, the vehicle may not be more than 2.10 meters high. You can also use our cozy covered terrace with table and chairs.
The fireplace is at your disposal. Firewood can always be found in the adjacent stream.
A small charcoal grill is available and can be used.
For the summer we have a large wooden pool in the garden, which you are welcome to use after consultation with us.



From here you can go on excellent cycling or hiking tours in the mountains, but you can also cycle in a relaxed manner across the surrounding fields.
Experienced cyclists can reach the Brocken at 1142 in about 2 to 3 hours. But please remember that you should also have suitable bicycles for this. You can also rent bicycles in nearby Ilsenburg or in Wernigerode.

The cycle paths in all directions are directly adjacent and you are immediately in nature. You can be in the tourist town of Wernigerode in about 30 minutes by bike. You are in Ilsenburg in about 20 minutes. Goslar and Bad Harzburg can also be reached quickly by bike.
Hiking tours can also be started from here. There are several bus stops nearby, from which buses depart regularly in the direction of Wernigerode and Ilsenburg.

Our property is located directly on the Via Romea pilgrim route, which leads from northern Germany to Rome, so we are also the perfect stopover for all pilgrims.

In the village of Veckenstedt you also have the opportunity to go shopping in the country market at normal discount prices. Hiwer there are also numerous regional specialties. The market is about a 10-minute walk from our garden. A bakery is also available, this is also open on Sundays. There is also a Volksbank ATM at the Landmarkt.
If you like to eat fish, the Veckenstedt fish farm is recommended, there is fresh fish and fish rolls here, and if you like fishing, there is also a fishing pond with trout, eel, pike, sturgeon, catfish, carp and zander.

The A 36 motorway is only a 5-minute drive away, so you are welcome to stay with us while you are passing through (don't worry, the motorway is far enough away so that your peace and quiet is never disturbed).

If you stay with us, you can shower and use the toilet in our house next door. The bathroom is fully equipped and you have drinking water and electricity. The sanitary facilities are available to you alone during your stay, they are not used by other people and are thoroughly cleaned after each rental.

If you arrive by car, you can park it under our carport (maximum height of the vehicle is 2.10 meters).

If you wish, I can then give you some insider tips on hiking, cycling or other interesting places on site.

We don't rent our garden twice, so you're always undisturbed and don't have to share the sanitary facilities.

We are very child-friendly and also have some equipment for children on site. A high chair is available and there is also a large sandpit in the garden that you are welcome to use. There is also a children's playground in the immediate vicinity.

If you come to us with children, we ask you to take good care of your little ones, as not every corner of our large garden can be made absolutely child-safe and our property is not completely fenced. Otherwise your children will be thrilled and can even play with us at the stream.

We look forward to you!
See you soon😉

name: Mini campsite Welcome to the farm in Nagele
description:
We cordially invite you to come and camp with us. We have a mini campsite with 15 camping spots of approximately 90m2. The campsite is completely surrounded by all kinds of trees. This gives the campsite a cozy appearance. Enjoy the beautiful garden, the large pond, the chickens and the many plum trees. For children there is a trampoline, a playhouse, a small slide, a go-kart, bicycles and scooters. There is a canopy where you can sit dry and out of the wind.
What is there to do near our campsite:
- Spar within walking distance for small groceries
- Schokkerhaven 15 minutes by bike. There you can sunbathe, swim and eat.
- Urk is half an hour by bike.
- The forest of Urk.
- Museum Schokland is fifteen minutes by bike.
- Orchideeënhoeve (tip for children) is 15 minutes away by car.
- Waterloopbos is 15 minutes away by car.
- The campsite is adjacent to a bicycle junction

Who knows see you soon!
Greetings Ronald and Floor

name: Quiet meadow in the middle of the forest near a nature reserve
description:
Near the mountain bike route Herentals / Kasterlee.
The Tikkebroeken nature reserve. Direct access to forest & hiking trails.

Nice lawn, surrounded by the forest. Back to basics - for people who want nothing for a while.

Pets allowed.

No plumbing.

name: Farm campsite with a mountain panorama near Lake Chiemsee
description:
Camping on the farm

Beautiful pitch in nature with impressive mountain views for caravans, vans or motorhomes. Our sideline farm is in an absolutely quiet, spacious location, about 200m from the road. An overnight stay with us is therefore also ideal for families with children. Pets are also welcome on our farm.

As a neighbor the Höslwang Golf Club, 10 minutes from Lake Chiemsee and only 30 minutes from the Alps. Munich is also easy to reach for a day trip. The Eggstätt-Hemhofer lake district invites you to hike and cycle in nature.

We are happy to provide our guests with wood for a campfire. Enjoy the peace and quiet on the pitch and the beautiful view of the mountains, while children can of course use the play equipment in the garden (trampoline, swing, playhouse with slide and sandpit, climbing pole).

We can give you lots of tips for excursions in the region, even if the weather doesn't play along.

Electricity is available, water is possible on request.

There are numerous producers in the area who sell their products directly on the farm without intermediaries and transport routes! Be sure to try it. Here you will find honey, eggs, milk, meat, cut flowers and more.

We look forward to you!

name: Organic farm Mlečnik
description:
Welcome to our Organic farm Mlečnik!

We kindly invite you to take a rest during your voyage on our big courtyard, in orchard or in vineyards.
Our farm is situated on a main road and is 4km away to the nearest highway exit on the A34(Italy) - H4 (Slovenia) highway.
You will find it right away because of a pretty large bamboo forest on either side of a big old house right beside the road, facing a large vineyard.

At our farm, it is possible to connect to electricity (220V or 380V) via extensions (yours or ours).

NEW! We have installed an outside solar shower!

As we live on organic farm, you can help us with our everyday work, or you can just take a tour of the farm and taste our organic wine (5€/person on site).

We will be delighted to have you here!

P.S.: Apparently also mosquitoes love organic farming, so please come prepared (nets on windows, repellents...)

name: Ecological farm with Friesian horses, chickens and picking garden near Sneek
description:
A small-scale campsite on the meadow behind with lots of privacy, peace and space. You can see Sneek, but it is still surrounded by vast meadows. From the camping site you can walk straight into the adjacent 6 hectare park, which is managed by the city farm. In summer our horses graze here. There is a wide ditch around the camping site and there is an almost completely unobstructed view, with birds of prey, grazing horses and sheep as a background. You hear a lot of frogs and now and then a deer walks! Children can enjoy climbing trees, building rafts, picking flowers and interacting with animals. The farm is still in development and we hope that our guests will want to think along with us and inspire us to make this beautiful place even more beautiful!

The farm is located on 2.4 hectares of land. There is a horse trough, a terrace with trampoline and sandpit, a large vegetable garden and several stables. We also have a local produce shop with a terrace, where you can buy cold drinks, ice cream, dairy products and vegetables. You can also buy local beer and wine here to take to your tent. There is a parking lot at the front where you can park your car. For our camping guests there is a freezer, refrigerator and washing machine to use.


THE CAMPING FIELD


The camping field is located behind the farm, far from the (very quiet) public road. The field is surrounded by a wide ditch and has a view of the meadows and the horses in the adjacent park. You can watch the sun go down here beautifully! There is room for 15 places. The sanitary building is located in the former cubicle shed and has separate ladies and gentlemen's areas, with a total of 5 toilets and 2 showers. It does have a step, so it is not easily accessible for the disabled. In the field is also our vegetable garden, where you can pick herbs and lettuce. There is also a covered seating area in the stable where you can play games or lounge. There are several water and power points on the site for general use, both indoors and outdoors.
ACTIVITIES


A few times a week, children can help with the care of the animals, such as feeding chickens and grooming ponies. Small children (up to 8 years) can take a ride on the Shetland ponies under supervision.

AREA


The beautiful city of Sneek with its many terraces, shops and old buildings is just a few minutes by bike. At 5 minutes cycling you can swim in the Zwette (canal). The Sneekermeer is 7 km away, where you can go swimming, sailing and water skiing. There are many restaurants within cycling distance that also deliver to the campsite. At 11 km you will find the most beautiful tropical swimming paradise in the North (in our opinion), SwimFun in Joure. Visit the 11 cities such as Sloten and Hindeloopen, eat some fish in picturesque Makkum, go wind- or kitesurfing for a day in Workum, rent a canoe or SUP board, there is a lot to do in beautiful Friesland.

name: Charming campsite in Den Ham (Twente) with a view of the Lemelerberg
description: Our charming campsite is a popular base for outdoor people. Experience the peace and quiet, within cycling distance of the Sallandse Heuvelrug National Park, the Vechtdal and the Regge where you can go canoeing or supping. 7 walking routes and cycling junction 3 and 18 start from our charming campsite. For children, the play forest on the Lemelerberg and Kabouterpad Zandstuve and the outdoor swimming pool are nearby. Come between mid-August and mid-September when the purple heather is in bloom.

name: Relaxing, space, freedom and nature.
description:
Our campsite for adults (14 years and older) is located in the middle of beautiful nature, but only a 10-minute walk from the pleasant village of Horta de Sant Joan.
On the beautiful 125 km long car-free walking and cycling route Via Verde where you can also walk super with the dog. (Google for images of this: Via verde Horta de sant joan) and at the nature park Els Ports. We do not have fixed camping pitches, so you can stand wherever you want. The site is over one hectare in size and there is a toilet block.
Free use of hot water, books, swimming pool, terrace, outdoor kitchen, BBQ and Wifi. We have a power connection for 5 places for € 3.50 per night. Meals and drinks available. Small shop assortment available

name: Back 2 Basics in green
description:
Welcome to the end of the streets, back to basics, a quiet piece of land in the heart of the Kempen. Unwind completely on an open meadow.

SERVICES
The facilities are limited to a pump with groundwater where you can freshen up or do your dishes. NB! This is not drinking water. There is also a cute wooden toilet.

CAMPFIRE
Making a fire in the evening? This is possible in a communal fire pit. You have to provide your own wood. You can always bring your own fire bowl if you want more privacy. Burning open fires is not allowed.

GAS FIRES/BBQ
Do you like to bake your own piece of meat or egg in the morning? Then you can bring a fire or (disposable) barbecue. Caution is advised in dry weather.

NATURE RESERVE
The meadow is within walking distance of the beautiful nature reserve De Lovenhoek, where a walking route takes you through meadows and woods along the water. A piece of heaven on earth.

THE BARN
"The Barn" is a barn behind the family home. Here you can consume something in the evening on request. It is not a public cafe.

RIVER
Warm weather? Book a day of canoeing or kayaking in advance with one of the local organizations. Or cool off on the banks of the Nete, where you can also swim.

HANNES BEAUTY LOUNGE
Perfect for a pampering day. Pedicure, manicure, facial care and all that for a great price. Early reservation is recommended.

name: Nature camping near the Mecklenburg Lake District
description:
Our small campsite is located directly on the river in the middle of the most beautiful Mecklenburg nature near the Mecklenburg Lake District and is ideal for guests who are looking for a quiet, natural and relaxed place in the countryside for their bus or tent. Electricity, gas, sanitary facilities with warm showers or a covered kitchen - you will find what you are looking for with us. We offer you a sunny meadow with a small harbor bar, a cool, shady forest and you can jump directly into the Elde to swim. Or how about a canoe tour on the water? You can rent canoes, SUPs or bicycles from us for your little bike tour through the woods and fields. Is there a desire for more culture? No problem, the beautiful state capital of Schwerin is easily accessible by car.

Arrival on the day of booking from 3 p.m. We warmly welcome you!

name: Quiet camping on a river in beautiful surroundings
description:
Escape the crowds and enjoy the tranquility of our secluded camping meadow in the middle of nature. With us you can camp back to basics with your tent, caravan or van and be completely off-grid. With a limited number of guests you can enjoy the silence and the beautiful starry sky. Choose your own spot on our site, in the meadow or along the stream. Enjoy almost wild camping, but with the luxury of an outdoor toilet and fire bowl with firewood.

For nature lovers who love comfort and luxury, we also offer a fully equipped Glamping tent. Discover the area with the many cycling and walking routes nearby, and visit the Achelse Kluis. Use our Campspace and experience the ultimate camping experience in Pelt. Book your stay now and enjoy the peace and nature, together with your family and friends!

Activities in the area: Dommel afvaart, curling balls, bicycle rental, bicycle package "Happen and stairs in Pelt".

name: Quiet camping between nature and the city center
description:
Unique place to camp in a 1 hectare forest in a park area within the ring of Herentals close to the city center and nature.
Perfect place for a city visit or a walking
or bike ride.
Canoeing is possible at 100 meters and Bobbejaanland can be reached on foot via a walking route along the Kleine Nete without crossing a street!
Firewood for the Campfire available on request!

name: On an adventure in the countryside
description:
Ghislain and his family are happy to welcome you to their beautiful farm in the heart of Lievegem.

Ghislain likes nothing more than receiving people, which is why he likes to take you along in his gigantic vegetable garden where there are kiwi berries and he likes to tell you about the farm and how he really makes everything himself...

Located on the edge of the Oude Kale valley, the meadow is the ideal starting point for walking or cycling trips. Discover the region and enjoy the tranquility of the meadow.

In addition, there is the possibility to do a covered wagon ride with Ghislain and in the summer there is a small pop-up bar with fresh drinks and fresh / local ice creams.

ARE YOU COMING BY TRAIN? Our farmer will pick you up at the station for €6 pp.

name: Camping at the farm
description: Small campsite 🏕 in Haute Ardenne, on the border of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. Family atmosphere and possibility of making small campfires in braziers. You also have the possibility to buy organic vegetables from the farm.

name: The Olive Grove 🌱 Glamping
description: We have beautiful fully equiped Bell tents in the Olive Grove or down by the river in the valley. Want to enjoy living off-grid in nature, but with the basic needs well arranged, come and be our guest.

name: Campsite in the countryside, 200 meters from the Baie de Somme and shops
description: Enjoy a quiet stay in 2500m2 of garden, just 200 meters from the Baie de Somme, cycle paths, all shops, departures for unforgettable activities (watching seals and seabirds in canoe, crossing the bay with a guide, steam train, tree climbing, etc...). Ideal location for exploring the surroundings, with walking access to all the city's points of interest: the medieval old town, the port, the tobacco pmu bars, restaurants, cinema, concerts and artists' exhibitions . Discover the surroundings of the Baie de Somme thanks to the cycle path, the steam train and the coach, with the SNCF station accessible in just 5 minutes by car or coach. Outings organized by nature guides, boat trips in the Bay, rental of sea kayaks, bicycles and river boats, 2 playgrounds and pétanque courts are available a maximum of 800 meters from the campsite. You can also enjoy the fishing pond, horse riding centers and visits to abbeys or castles. I suggest you take you to collect plants from the Bay, fish for gray shrimp, observe seals, discover pebble beaches, sand or forests where you can enjoy the space in peace, even in summer. Combine outdoor activities, relaxation, discovery of nature and historical sites for a memorable vacation!

name: Bourgogne-Franche-Comté : Camping artistique à la ferme Les Sauges dans le Parc Naturel du Morvan
description:
Situé au sommet d'une colline dans le Parc Naturel du Morvan, le camping à la ferme Les Sauges offre une vue imprenable sur le Mont Blanc, pour des vacances au vert en Bourgogne-Franche-Comté. Le camping est un véritable havre de paix où vous pourrez profiter d'un camping à l'état sauvage avec les commodités nécessaires pour des escapades en pleine nature. Les six emplacements sont spacieux et offrent un cadre calme et paisible, idéal pour des vacances en famille ou des randonnées.

Certains des emplacements disposent d'une alimentation électrique tandis que deux autres sont éloignés et sans électricité pour ceux qui cherchent un camping plus rural. Le camping est également éco-responsable avec des installations sanitaires économes en eau.

Le camping est équipé de toilettes et d'une douche pour plus de confort. De plus, une cuisine commune entièrement équipée est disponible pour les campeurs, avec une table et des chaises pour les jours de pluie.

Pour les enfants, il ya toutes sortes d'animaux de la ferme, un trampoline et un toboggan, ce qui en fait un lieu idéal pour une escapade en famille axée sur la vie à la campagne.

Le camping à la ferme Les Sauges propose également des activités pour ceux qui cherchent à s'immerger dans la vie à la campagne, avec des cours sur le langage corporel des chevaux dispensé par les propriétaires. Il s'agit d'une occasion unique de découvrir les secrets des chevaux et de communiquer avec eux de manière plus naturelle.

Le camping à la ferme Les Sauges est également un lieu de rencontre pour les « faiseurs », avec la possibilité d'organiser des représentations théâtrales, des concerts, des danses, ou pour tout autre événement organisé par les faiseurs locaux. La grange abrite également une forge tenue par un coutelier local pour ceux qui souhaitent découvrir les métiers traditionnels.

Anyway, le camping à la ferme Les Sauges offre un cadre idéal pour ceux qui cherchent à se ressourcer dans la nature. Le camping est entouré de vastes espaces verts pour des activités de plein air, et d'une vue panoramique à couper le souffle. Profitez du calme et de la beauté de la vie simple en camping dans un lieu unique en son genre. Réservez dès maintenant pour des vacances écotouristiques en Bourgogne-Franche-Comté.

name: RAI riding Dasing near Augsburg
description:
Welcome to RAI riding in Dasing.

Our pitches with a direct view of the paddocks are located in the idyllic Wittelsbacher Land between Munich and Augsburg. Our camping guests will find drinking water, electricity, a warm shower and a covered kitchen here. Pets are also allowed. Alternatively, you are welcome in our fully equipped trapper log cabins or in one of our Native American tipis (maximum of three guests each).


What you will experience with us:

Rest, relaxation, animals. RAI riding is a bitless leisure and trail riding style. Our training center offers riding lessons in theory and practice, and even the youngest can learn to ride a real cowboy horse. Our walks and hikes with our alpacas are also popular. On the way in the Wittelsbacher Land, our guests experience a deceleration from everyday life together with the peaceful Andean camels.

name: Naturia, Eco camp of Chimay. Here we meet
description: An Eco-camping of 6 hectares of pure nature. 70 pitches, 2 ponds, a country bistro, a pretty shop and a very warm human welcome

name: Peaceful garden near a forest
description:
We are located in Meetjesland, just 3 km from the Lembeek forests.
It is the ideal starting point for a whole series of relaxing cycling and walking tours in this beautiful region with its varied faces of forests, creeks, quiet roads and charming villages.
Would you rather take a trip to the city?
Ghent - a bustling city full of culture and trendy hotspots - is only 15 km away. Via the Lieve (river) you can go there by bike or you can take the bus (stop 1 km) or the tram (stop 5 km).
Or would you like to plan a day trip to the sea?
Knokke is the seaside resort known for its exclusive location by the sea and large villas and is about 40 km away.

name: La madriguera azul (The blue burrow)
description: Welcome to La Madriguera Azul, a place in the middle of nature where you can camp and/or sleep in a Mongolian Yurt and enjoy nature. There is also a big river with a swimming pool and a magical forest to go deep into; a trampoline to jump on for the little ones or the most daring ones and nightly bonfires with skies full of stars! All around us there are several routes for hiking or biking. And, although it is difficult not to get entangled and enjoy the terrain, there are also many other activities close to home by car: 25 minutes from spectacular beaches like Berria or Trengandin to enjoy the sea (Surf/Kite surfing); 30 minutes from Santander and its great bay, 45 minutes from the source of the Ansón River and its great waterfall and 45 minutes from Bilbao, its old town and its great museums (Museum of Fine Arts and Gugenheim Museum).

name: Great sunrises
description:
In the back of our small trail riding station, with a wide view over fields and forests, we have space for tents and mobile homes. In good weather you can see as far as the Tangermünde church tower. There are also many fine restaurants and attractions in this beautiful old imperial city. Various seating areas, electricity, fresh water and a toilet are available to our visitors. A savings box is available for using the hot water shower. (If you book the Reiterstübchen, the hot water shower is included). A small pond, in which you can also swim, is just under a kilometer from the village. But also a small forest swimming pool can be reached in 15 minutes by bike. Anyone who has always wanted to sleep in a stable can do so with us. As a special form of accommodation, travelers can use our little rider's room with sleeping galleries. We have a BBQ area and, if needed, a gas grill. Since the Altmark has the largest interconnected network of bridle paths in Germany, there are countless hiking and biking trails here.
A wall box is available for e-car drivers for a fee. 50 meters from the farm is the village soccer field for younger visitors.

name: Finca Ermita
description:
My name is Greg
I am an olive oil producer
the farm has no pesticides and respects nature
the finca ermita is 10 hectares of century-old olive trees, carob trees and almond trees
5 kms from the beaches and creek of l'ampolla fishing village restaurant ice cream parlors supermarket
5 kms from the village El perello
6 kms from the Elbro delta
mountain bike trails and hikes at the exit of the property and beautiful weather
calm setting sea view on the delta delbre the mountains a magnificent sunset and especially nature
you will be able to access the entire property
no fires except barbecues
to respect the environment
and the others occupy animals like the human being

name: cozy farm with fruit orchard and beautiful views
description:
On our cozy farm we have a heated and comfortable caravan in the yard and a number of camping spots, where you can enjoy the view of the fruit orchard with trees that are almost two centuries old and the roaming animals, including chickens, cats, sheep, goats, a calf and horses. Located in the West Frisian countryside, 3 km from the IJsselmeer and 10 km from Enkhuizen, Hoorn and Medemblik. In the yard you can cuddle and care for all the animals, help in the vegetable garden, have a barbecue, sit around the campfire, participate in yoga classes, play games in the barn, look up at the sky in the tall grass, and much more: )

There is an outside toilet and we have a nice communal bathroom with toilet, sink and hot shower. You can also use the outdoor shower for an adventurous, refreshing (cold) shower :)

A delicious breakfast with fresh local products, firewood and barbecue can be ordered/rented for an additional fee.

Breakfast: €14.50 pppn
Firewood : €5 / bucket
BBQ : €5 / time, excluding coals (reserve this on time!)

name: Natural camping at Domaine du Moulin Neuf in the Parc Naturel Périgord-Limousin.
description: Experience a unique WildCamp Périgord-Limousin in the heart of the Périgord-Limousin Regional Natural Park. Discover an oasis of peace on the Moulin Neuf nature reserve, a private domain of 25ha, where nature and the landscape of the Périgord-Vert meet. Set up your tent for a nature holiday in the Périgord-Limousin Park and enjoy a natural lake of 1.1 hectares to fish for brown trout and swim in crystal clear waters. Enjoy a picnic in an idyllic setting with available tables. At WildCamp, we are committed to eco-friendly and responsible living and promote discounted rates for Camp Space visitors. Go on an eco-friendly holiday in the Périgord and reconnect with nature at Domaine du Moulin Neuf 1605.

name: Camping Sous Les Étoiles Normandie
description: Discover the charm of Normandy at camping "Sous Les Etoiles", a picturesque family campsite, nestled in the welcoming village of St Martin des Besaces, Calvados. Benefit from our unique offer of camping and caravaning suitable for all ages. Our extensive camping pitches in Calvados are ideally located in a lush rural park of more than 5 hectares, offering stunning views of the green fields, and are protected by a variety of trees and hedges. Savour the melody of bird song and the wonder of a diverse fauna during your nights spent "Under the Stars". Our private and pet-friendly campsite in Normandy, is within walking distance of the village center, where a range of shops and services is available. Discover the essence of nature and the friendly atmosphere in St Martin des Besaces, a rural campsite with a view in Normandy that will make you live an unforgettable experience.

name: Quinta da Hortelã - A Nature Paradise near Porto
description:
Quinta da Hortelã it's a farm house with a small forest area surrounding a blueberry plantation. Lots of space for tents and easy access for small caravans and small motorhomes.

The setting, although only 25 km from Porto, Braga or Guimarães, (all with quite good train connections from the local stations) is extremely quite with absolute silence, except for the natural water streams and wildlife. Situated in a montain top, it's possible, on a clean day, to see the sea from the garden.

There are two main spots to stay. A flat garden, covered in grass and a forest area, with lots of shade. Access is easy for cars and small motorhomes. Caravans, if too long, can have some trouble with the gate.

There is a complete bathroom, with shower and hot water inside the old barn. This is open 24h.

The barn serves as a room for all kinds of activities. Electricity is easily reached and extension cords can be provided (although these are limited in number). There is a refrigerator and a barbeque available.

There is also free Wi-Fi access by the main house.

During the year there are several activities at the farm, mainly linked to agriculture and culinary.

Outside the farm, within walking distance, you can find a horse riding school, several well marked trails, water falls, a catolic sanctuary with magnificent views and the ruins of an ancient (pre-roman) human settlement.

Within less than 30 minutes you can reach cities like Porto, Guimarães or Braga, all with lots to offer.

We welcome families and allow pets.

There is also a children playground and a small water tank, perfect for a hot summer day.

name: Recharge your batteries with stunning views of the Gers countryside.
description: Discover our spacious and picturesque 'camping bike-friendly Gers', nestled in the heart of the countryside. Enjoy unparalleled freedom in our 'camping spacious countryside', choosing your ideal location among our shady areas, offering both privacy and stunning views. Enjoy electric connections for caravans and motorhomes, an equipped kitchen, a barbecue, a laundry room and a games room. Enjoy a refreshing swim in our campsite with saltwater pool, at the owner’s discretion. Our owners, certified French Federal Instructor and Initiator, are at your disposal for advice, thus ensuring an 'active holiday in the Gers'. Explore the surroundings with our mountain bikes and electric bikes for rent - a perfect opportunity for a 'mountain bike camping rental'. The trails start directly at our door. The nearby village, 4 km away, offers all amenities as well as a mountain bike base offering more than 300 km of marked trails. Our campsite in the Gers is the ideal starting point for a multitude of activities and places to visit, enriching your holiday.

name: Small-scale countryside campsite (suitable for children)
description:
We - a 'young' family - took over this spot in early 2022 because we dreamed of receiving our own guests. This will be our second season and along the way we will continue to make the campsite more our own and an even nicer place to stay :)

The campsite has a total of 40 places, which are divided over two fields.

On the main field you stand in a semicircle around the central (nature) playground. This way you almost always have a view of the smallest(s).

If they like, children can also collect eggs, feed the goats, comb the donkeys or play in the small gnome forest. If there are enough children, we will also drive around on a tractor, we will see a big smile on the faces!

Would you rather stand a little quieter? The Groene Weide is a field behind the dry weather area of the campsite where you have plenty of space and a beautiful view over the fields.

We have an Urban Arrow for rent if you want to enjoy cycling in the area of the Sallandse Heuvelrug. You can also light a fire with us with a special wood stove (also for rent) or rent our Dutchtub from Weltevree for an evening of relaxation.

Every guest receives a bowl of eggs from our chickens as a welcome gift, just because we like having you here!

name: Fun and cheerfulness in the polder between the Biesbosch and the Efteling
description:
Our mission is to bring joy. We have a nice place that we would like to share with other people!

We are almost on the Maas, your view is the dike of the Maas. From here there are beautiful cycling routes to, among other things, the Loonse and Drunense dunes and the Biesbosch. We are in the middle! And the fortified towns of Woudrichem and Heusden are also worth a visit!
It is also a beautiful area for walking in the countryside.
Efteling is easily accessible by bicycle and car!

To increase this cheerfulness, in addition to a beautiful environment, we also have cozy fellow residents that we would like to introduce to you:

We have 1 African mountain goat, 2 piglets and a chicken coop with a rooster that likes to be heard during the day.
The 2 dogs are also ready to greet you! Joey is our old grandpa who is a bit deaf but really wants to cuddle! And next to that we have Storm who is a big teddy bear and thinks he's a lap dog :)

Finally, we have our hunters Josha and Sjimmie (cat) who are responsible for pest control. Mice in particular are a favorite. But you can also come for an inspection as soon as the awning is up :)

There is plenty of space for children to discover and play creatively. There is wood everywhere to make huts. We are also located on the old mesh, so there is also plenty to discover on the waterfront.
They are also allowed to use the playground. There is, among other things, a playground with a swing and slide, a sandpit and a trampoline!

In other words, a cheerful place to enjoy the peace in these troubled times!

name: Rustic orchard
description:
Hello, everyone.
We have a rustic property from around 1827 on the outside.
What awaits you there?
A lot of nature awaits you on three hectares of land where you can look for a quiet spot. You can also look at the pond in the foresight of nature.
You can taste our organic apples on site.
At dusk, something extraordinary sometimes comes out of the woods.
They are wild mouflons.
There are many hiking/pilgrimage routes.
In Bitburg (10km away) there is a swimming pool as well as loads of shops and a brewery tour accessible by bus!
The Luxembourg border with the Luxembourg "Switzerland" and the Müllertal is not far by car. We look forward to getting to know you as guests.

name: Unique attractive mini campsite with swimming pond, sauna, privacy and cosiness
description:
Come and enjoy our attractive mini-camping site 'Het Zomernest' where you can experience peace, space and privacy for 2 months a year (July 7 to September 3), as well as enjoy the atmosphere. Swim among the fish in our beautiful natural swimming pond and find the ultimate relaxation in our wonderful sauna with outdoor shower. At your disposal is also a spacious fire pit, a trampoline, a football field, a chicken coop with fresh eggs, an outdoor bar with coffee and tea in the morning, an indoor bar where you can enjoy a drink in the evening and a shower building. with 2 spacious showers, 2 toilets, a urinal, a combined shower & toilet and a covered washing-up area.

The grounds are park-like with many different shrubs and plants; a true paradise for many birds and butterflies. The campsite has 14 spacious camping pitches, each with its own power point, 2 of which already have a fully equipped folding trailer or camper that can be rented for a small additional charge if you do not own one yourself. Due to the small amount of camping pitches, there is a lot of space, privacy and the possibility for personal contact when desired.

There is plenty of room for entertainment for young and old on and around the site. In the evening there are marshmallows to roast in the fire pit with a view of the sunset and twice a week you can watch a nice movie in our outdoor cinema in the evening. Behind the site, a 5-minute walk away, you will find a beautiful nature reserve 'Schans de Katshaar' and there are many walking and cycling routes in the area. The nearest supermarket in Schoonebeek is 10 minutes by bike or 5 minutes by car. If you want to do something more active in the area, the old fortified town of Coevorden is also easy to reach by car. At about 10 minutes drive you will also find Plopsa Indoor and the Hutten Hoogte Center Parcs with AquaMundo and activities such as laser tag, bowling, climbing and Adventure golf as entertainment for everyone. Afterwards you can enjoy all the peace, space and nature on our site.

name: Campsite "Les Pieds dans l'Herbe": Rejuvenating stay 20 minutes from the ocean in Pays de la Loire
description: Discover our charming campsite located in the countryside and nestled in a shady and peaceful setting. Whether you are in a tent, caravan, van or motorhome, our campsite offers pitches adapted to your needs. Enjoy a rejuvenating stay away from the bustle of the city, while being only 20 minutes from the ocean beaches. Our campsite is the ideal place for nature lovers, families and couples in search of tranquility. Located in the beautiful Pays de la Loire region, our campsite is ideal for exploring the surrounding area. Book now for an unforgettable experience in the heart of nature.

name: Macesen farm
Relax, rest and space at 't Heuvelken
description: 't Heuvelken is located on the edge of the 500+ hectare Merode domain and the Gerhagen park, close to the three-province point of Antwerp/Limburg/Flemish Brabant. 't Heuvelken has everything to recharge your batteries, in connection with nature: relax, tranquility and space. You can place your tent or camper on the edge of the forest, with a beautiful view and the sound of the birdsong. Electricity, potable water and optional sanitary facilities are available, as are a wide range of leisure options in the immediate vicinity.

name: Glastonbury Orchard
description: Peaceful garden working cider apple orchard. Country lanes, cycling, dog walking, plenty of places of interest to visit locally. Close to the famous festival site. 5 miles from Glastonbury town. Owners live on site but 1.5 acre orchard to hideaway in. Campfire spot. Teepee to gather in, small brook running through, beehives, woodpeckers, owls etc. ! Cider to try and buy 🍾

name: Spending the night in the green with doctor Rombauts
description:
Welcome to the domain of former mayor and doctor Rombauts.

Come spend the night in a large garden with fruit trees, greenhouses, many sitting areas and a small grove, where you can relax in one of the cozy corners in the green. You are welcome in your own tent, caravan or camper, or sleep well in the furnished glamping tent!

In addition to the bathroom inside, there is also a lovely outdoor shower (with hot water) and a fire pit with a grill on which you can also have a BBQ.

Cuddle dog Tito is included.

The country house is within walking distance of Lippelobos. The area is also suitable for cycling and walking tours, eg. along the center of Flanders, various castles or the breweries of Karmeliet, Malheur, Palm, Cornet and Duvel. I can also give you tips about nice coffee bars, where you can eat delicious ice cream or waffles or have cozy terraces.
...but the best part is of course relaxing in the garden itself!

There is a supermarket nearby with a bakery section (open on Sunday mornings!)
Ins ta gram: doctorrombauts

name: Rehmseecamp near the state capital Schwerin
description:
We offer three beautiful pitches for self-sufficient mobile homes and caravans.
You are standing on a 2500 square meter meadow with shady trees,
near the state capital Schwerin. Fresh water, WiFi included, electricity if required kWh 50 cents. Grill available. Direct lake access. Swimming possible. We provide our guests with two canoes that can be used at any time. Shops and restaurants 2 km away. The surrounding area invites you to go fishing, hiking and cycling. An information board offers further excursion tips.
Schwerin Castle can also be easily reached via cycle paths in 12 km.

Warm welcome!

name: Not perfect, but cozy
description:
Our location is located in Angeren, located between Arnhem and Nijmegen.

You camp in our garden. This is also a special garden also shop. It is possible that customers walk past your camper, and that cheerful children jump on the trampolines in the garden.

According to real cycling connoisseurs, it is a great environment.
Millingenwaard - De Veluwe - Park Lingezegen - Montferland

name: Atmospheric campsite in Haulerwijk, near Veenhuizen and Bakkeveen
description: Original mini camping with tea garden and special accommodations. You can light a fire with us and we are happy to spoil you with a delicious breakfast and introductory tickets for the Open Air Swimming Pool. Within walking distance of the village of Haulerwijk and within cycling distance of Veenhuizen, Bakkeveen, Norg and Fochteloerveen. Do you want to go a little further away? Assen and Groningen are only half an hour away. There is a bus stop in front of the door and you can rent bicycles within walking distance. We operate as sustainable a business as possible.

name: mini campsite near Weerribben
description:
A friendly farm campsite with rural views.
From the campsite you can easily walk into the nature reserve or cycle.
We have gypsy wagons and safari tents that can be rented. With a caravan, camper, camper bus or tent you are most welcome. Our campsite is located near the Rottige Meente nature reserve and the Weerribben. We have free wifi and hot water in the showers is free.
the sanitary building has just been renovated. The campsite is surrounded by farmlands, we have many fruit trees and some hobby animals sheep, goats, calves and 2 pigs. There are many cycling and walking routes to choose from from the campsite. Also think of wonderful trips to Blokzijl, or Giethoorn and in Lemmer you can visit the UNESCO woudagemaal. There is also a tearoom at the campsite for delicious cakes, coffee, high tea or lunch.

name: Camping Ferme Bretagne: Emplacements Nature & Agritourisme à Feins
description: Découvrez notre charmante ferme à Feins, en Bretagne, offrant des emplacements camping nature pour votre camping-car. Vivez un séjour rural authentique au cœur de la nature bretonne, rencontrez nos moutons, poules et savourez nos légumes bio. Profitez de l'hébergement en ferme bretonne et des nombreuses activités de loisirs à proximité pour un agritourisme inoubliable.

name: Camping Johanna's Bos in a young food forest in the middle of the polder landscape
description:
Experience the warm and cozy atmosphere of Johanna's Bos, a charming mini campsite located in a beautiful emerging (still young) food forest. If you like vast landscapes and panoramic views, you will certainly enjoy our idyllic location in the polder, near the beautiful Amstelmeer.

The Amstelmeer offers a range of water sports options, such as swimming, windsurfing, kitesurfing and sailing. There is also a beautiful route of about 14 km around the lake, ideal for walking or cycling. In addition, Johanna's Bos is centrally located between Schagen and Den Helder, and you can easily go to Texel for a day. Don't forget to explore the former island of Wieringen, which is full of beautiful spots. A visit to Hoenderdeall animal park is recommended for families, and of course a day of relaxation on the beach is always good when the weather is nice.

Tine and Ben, the owners of Johanna's Bos, know the area like no other, because they grew up here and after living in the Randstad for 20 years, they returned to their roots. On the campsite you will find a beautiful new toilet block, which was built last winter. If you want to enjoy a tasty breakfast with fresh rolls, coffee and juice in the morning, let us know and we will arrange it for you (can be done upon arrival). And if you fancy a refreshing Johanna's Beer upon arrival, we'll be happy to help.

Come and discover the beautiful flowers, meadow birds and typical Dutch skies at Johanna's Bos. Book your spot now and we hope you will have a wonderful stay at our campsite!

name: Micro camping between the Frisian lakes
description:
Are you looking for peace, space, an unobstructed view and do you want to enjoy the simple farm life? A place where you can escape from the hectic pace of everyday life? Then you are very welcome at our small, active dairy farm located on the Grote Gaastmeer in Southwest Friesland.

Advantages of our campspot:
- very small scale
- you will find peace, space and privacy
- there are 40 dairy cows in the meadow that are your closest neighbors on some days
- we have a sweet farm dog, cats and a brown laying hen
- there are many meadow birds in the area
- The cozy Eleven Cities town of Workum is about 7 km away. Here you will find various cozy eateries, museums, 2 supermarkets and a surf spot
- the farm is located along the Sint Odulphus pilgrimage path and the Oersetters Pontjesroute

Enough to see and experience. We hope to welcome you.

Oant Sjen! Martin & Esther

name: Farm campsite with a natural bathing lake
description: Discover our small, idyllic campsite by the lake, embedded in the unspoiled nature of France. Our unique environment, free from pesticides, offers you an authentic nature experience. Your children can actively participate in the daily animal care and take responsibility for our lovable animals at the lake campsite. Live unforgettable moments immersed in nature at our campsite for tents, campers and caravans.

name: Small and colorful campsite with alpacas
description: On the edge of National Park Weerribben-Wieden, situated on an idyllic country road. That's where our small-scale and cheerful pearl of a campsite is located. Between the wooded banks and in the middle of nature. A place for bon vivants where alpacas, the outdoors, conviviality and relaxation are central and where holiday happiness begins. The place where you come to stay if you are looking for a personal and attractive stay, away from the masses. A place where everyone is welcome and where you can be yourself. Looking for a catered adventure? Our attractive accommodations are ready for you! Would you rather come with your own (roof) tent, camper van, caravan or folding trailer? Choose one of the spacious camping spots and enjoy! Will we see you soon?

name: Relax, Refresh, Reconnect in the French countryside
description:
Discover our 6 hectare estate nestled in the peaceful farmlands of the Creuse in New Aquitaine, France. Stay in our luxuriously appointed guest rooms or Sibleybell tents, ideal for families and couples looking for a countryside break, a relaxing retreat or a stay in nature. Enjoy facilities such as a football/badminton court, play barn, lake, swing and trampolines. Shared outdoor kitchen and convivial meals available.

Our rural accommodation also offers a holiday home for two people, a bed and breakfast and space for caravans and tents. Discover the green Creuse, its hills, lakes, castles, historic villages and flea markets. Contact us for advice on excursions and walks in the area. Enjoy an unforgettable stay with your family, as a couple or alone in our charming establishment in New Aquitaine.

name: Fifty shades of green, a place for those seeking tranquility
description: Discover our quiet and spacious campsite, located in one of the most beautiful spots of the Haute-Saône. Enjoy large flat areas with a beautiful view and brand new sanitary facilities. There are no frills or children's facilities here. Our ideal location in Colombotte is perfect for outdoor activities such as hiking, cycling, horse riding, motorcycle and car rides. We also offer the possibility to camp with your horse on a part of our terrain that is intended for grazing. If you do not wish to camp, an adjoining B&B is available. With 3 bathrooms for 6 people, our sanitary facilities are cleaned daily and well ventilated. In addition, our dishwashing area is spacious, with two separate sinks. Campers can take advantage of La Tourelle's saltwater pool, ideal for cooling off after a day of outdoor activities. We also offer pitches with electricity (10amp) for a comfortable camping experience. In addition, our fridge freezer in the bathroom makes it easy to store your food and drinks. Book your stay with us now for a peaceful and enjoyable camping experience in an ideal setting for those who want to recharge and enjoy nature.

name: Yoga Eco Farm, 5 min walk from the Mediterranean!
description:
We are a non-profit Yoga Eco Farm based in the Italian town of Otranto.
Following the principles of Yoga and Permaculture, our main goals are regenerating ecosystems, and inspiring people to follow their most uplifting and loving inner voice, raising awareness about eco-conscious and mindful living in a fun inclusive environment.
We are part of a worldwide grass root movement, and your support and participation is key to make a difference!

name: Wonderful camping spot in the middle of the Achterhoek nature!
description:
We live in beautiful Toldijk located in the municipality of Bronckhorst.
You can camp with us in the bongerd (fruit orchard) where you have a nice and quiet and secluded spot. Here you can enjoy the tranquility, the wild animals or just go out and about.

You can relax here and discover the area by experiencing one of the many cycling or walking routes.

Or rent one of our inflatable supboards to discover the area on the water! (Book in advance! Op=Op)

In our farm shop we have a wide range of delicious local products such as juices and drinks, salads, potatoes, vegetables and fruit, meat and dairy and so on.
It is also possible to order freshly baked Achterhoek spelled bread for the next morning.

In the vicinity are several swimming, shopping centers and supermarkets.
Toldijk is located between Doetinchem and Zutphen and is 30 minutes by car to Arnhem.

* The shower is a cold water outdoor shower so bring a swimsuit if you want to use it

*Power is NOT included in the price

*We have fire pits and wood for sale in our shop

name: Special charm campsite
description:
Welcome to Camping Luna “de Rolke”
We are Camping Luna "de Rolke" and will focus more on free places, healthy lunch in the Orangerie, food forest and vegetable garden and the wonderful outdoor life with music and creativity. 🔥🫖⛺️🏡🎻
A nice charming campsite where you can enjoy all year round between animals and nature.
Experience and enjoy ♡

Love team La Luna Care
