name: Quiet camping on a river in beautiful surroundings
description:
Escape the crowds and enjoy the tranquility of our secluded camping meadow in the middle of nature. With us you can camp back to basics with your tent, caravan or van and be completely off-grid. With a limited number of guests you can enjoy the silence and the beautiful starry sky. Choose your own spot on our site, in the meadow or along the stream. Enjoy almost wild camping, but with the luxury of an outdoor toilet and fire bowl with firewood.

For nature lovers who love comfort and luxury, we also offer a fully equipped Glamping tent. Discover the area with the many cycling and walking routes nearby, and visit the Achelse Kluis. Use our Campspace and experience the ultimate camping experience in Pelt. Book your stay now and enjoy the peace and nature, together with your family and friends!

Activities in the area: Dommel afvaart, curling balls, bicycle rental, bicycle package "Happen and stairs in Pelt".

name: Domaine la Chabanne campsite
description:
It is in the heart of the Montagne Bourbonnaise that Gérard and Nikè welcome you to their domain. We offer you our family campsite located about 7 km from Châtel-Montagne.
Surrounded by forest and fields, our campsite will suit families, nature lovers and outdoor sports activities. The campsite consists of 17 spacious pitches, 8 lodge tents, 6 of which have private sanitary facilities. plus 3 unusual luxurious dome type accommodation. Electricity is accessible to all. Hot showers, individual sinks, toilets and the baby area are available at all times.

On our 2 hectare site you will find an indoor swimming pool, a petanque court, ping-pong tables and a playground for children.
In our small restaurant with covered terrace, we offer pizzas, quiches, salads, steak frites. Every morning, breads, croissants and pain au chocolat are baked on site. During the week, sometimes, we organize barbecue evenings or ham on the spit.

name: Nature and relaxation
description:
Garden with trees with the possibility of beautiful walks, close to
forests for walking or mountain biking.
For purists, possibility of camping in the forest, if you are independent (electricity, water, toilets).

name: La Maison du Bonheur - Outdoor campsite in the Périgord Vert in the Dordogne
description:
Located in Dordogne, in New Aquitaine, the Maison du Bonheur campsite in the heart of Périgord Vert offers an exceptional and peaceful natural setting for an unforgettable holiday. In the heart of the French countryside, this campsite offers spacious pitches for tents, caravans and motorhomes, as well as authentic and warm trailers.

Nature lovers will appreciate the nearby hiking trails, as well as the fishing, canoeing and cycling opportunities in the surrounding area. Within this green setting, you can also enjoy the presence of various animals that move freely, adding a touch of authenticity and friendliness to your stay.

By staying at this campsite in the Dordogne, you will be ideally located to explore the region and its historical and cultural sites, such as the caves of Lascaux, the medieval town of Sarlat, and the many castles and picturesque villages that dot the landscape.

Whether you are looking for a family getaway, a romantic stay or an adventure with friends, this outdoor campsite offers you an authentic experience of New Aquitaine.

name: CamperCamping Alpedrinha
description:
Do you want to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life?
The need to withdraw into nature?

Then this is the perfect place.
Between the fruit trees and Aloe vera it is wonderful to enjoy with a view of the Serra da Gardunha.
Alpedrinha is a historic village in the center of Portugal with countless hiking trails, viewpoints and day beaches to cool off in the summer.

This place is close to Serra da Estrela, Monsanta, Penha Garcia and Fundao this is the cherry region of Portugal.

A spacious and safe place with a beautiful sunset to disconnect from the busy world.

name: small farm campsite in the Luxembourg Ardennes
description:
Camping Berkel is a small-scale family and farm campsite located in a valley of the Luxembourg Ardennes, surrounded by a beautiful hilly landscape. The campsite is located on the river 'Sûre' and has a natural, friendly and relaxed atmosphere.

In addition to camping at the campsite, you can also enjoy the authentic atmosphere that the farm exudes and the beautiful nature that is ideal for walking, cycling, fishing and mountain biking.

There are two beautiful Safari tents on the campsite that can be rented. These are fully furnished, making it an adventurous and luxurious way of 'camping'.
Furthermore, the campsite offers the possibility to stay in the farm. Four beautiful rooms with a cozy common dining room are part of the so-called 'Bed and Breakfast'.

name: Meadow with a distant view
description: Beautiful camping meadow with a distant view not far from the Siebengebirge and the Rhine

name: Eco Nature Campsite Klein Schoor
description: Small eco campsite where nature and people go together. 12 spacious camping spots offer the opportunity to explore the area through the many cycling and walking routes. On the property is a fire pit, swimming pond, outdoor kitchen, compost toilet and much more. Of course there is also a neat toilet room. More than enough for everyone

name: A stay in the heart of nature surrounded by animals
description:
Hello to you, we offer you our 3000 m2 garden including a one hectare pond, a space dedicated to permaculture and a second dedicated to breeding.
You will not hesitate to glean some vegetables and fruits in the heart of our vegetable garden
The natural aspect of the site is preserved.
There are countless birds.
Since 2007, a beaver family has built their lodge on the pond. You will undoubtedly be able to observe it during your wanderings in the boat on the pond.
We reserve a space for you located away from the house and the street in order to guarantee your privacy and your serenity.
We are surrounded by nature in the heart of Fagne-Famenne.
We are near a lake, in the countryside.
The nature there is lush.
You will observe the murins at nightfall.
Be lulled by the croaking of green frogs.
We will put maps showing the most beautiful hiking routes in our beautiful region. Our donkeys can accompany you on a ride.

name: Country house Talander
description:
Come and enjoy the vast regional forests in the Antwerp Kempen. From your camping pitch you have an ideal base for many wonderful hiking or cycling trips. The camping spot is located along the forest where you can leave a few meters away for a walk along walking routes that have been selected for walk of the year 2021, being the bridge walk of 10 km and the grave raven path of 3 km. If you prefer to enjoy the peace and quiet, you will probably find a nice spot close to or at your camping spot itself. Your camping pitch is located in the ecological garden of a Talander vzw country house. Talander vzw is an initiative for people with a disability. In this country house, a companion lives with two people in co-housing, they are happy to be your hosts.

Ask them about the local assets, because they are certainly there. For the sporty holidaymaker and / or the rather quieter, there are many beautiful, interesting nice places to discover.
At the camping spot you can find peace and sniff the wonderful forest scent.
Would you like to enjoy breakfast in the morning? Let your hosts know, for an affordable amount they will be happy to prepare something for you, perhaps with ingredients from their own garden.

In the evening you can enjoy the sounds of the forest here: the song thrush, a grunting woodcock that flies over and when the campfire is lit you can also hear the tawny owl by the crackling fire.
If you have any questions about the possibilities at the camping site, you can always contact the hosts.

name: Lovely camping in peace and quiet in a beautiful environment.
description:
Quiet campsite Occitanie - Domaine Troteligotte : Space, Charm & Nature in the heart of the Lot, South West France

Discover our beautiful Lot campsite, Domaine Troteligotte, a spacious and peaceful retreat nestled in a beautiful setting in Occitania, in the heart of South West France. With its 6 spacious pitches spread over 2 hectares, our nature campsite Lot offers you a quiet and cozy stay for an outdoor holiday in Occitania.

Enjoy the freedom of unmarked pitches to choose the ideal place to relax in this peaceful campsite in Occitanie. Just 7 km from the charming village of Prayssac, you will have access to all the amenities you need to enjoy your stay, such as restaurants, supermarkets and various shops.

Enjoy an unforgettable experience and recharge your batteries during your peaceful stay in the southwest of France at Camping Domaine Troteligotte, near Prayssac.

name: Quiet natural campsite near the Wadden Sea
description:
Just 600 km from the Netherlands, we welcome you to our quiet and sheltered nature campsite on the edge of the Wadden Sea National Park in southwest Denmark. Just 20 minutes from the Wadden island of Rømø with the widest sandy beach in Northern Europe. The site is located in beautiful Marskland with its rich bird life, a paradise for bird watchers, walkers and cyclists, not far from the historic towns of Tønder, Møgeltønder and Ribe. Enjoy the peace, space and nature with us!
We speak Dutch!

name: Peaceful place on the farm
description:
Camping in peace at an old farm.
Located 15 minutes from Ypres center, 15 minutes from Diksmuide and 30 minutes from the coast.
Zoo de Zonneglow just 2 km away.
Ideal for passing through, for cycling in the area or just to enjoy the peace between the fields.
There are also flat paved places to park the mobile home. Electricity is possible with an extension cable.
It is a real camp space without much luxury (and that is the intention).
But lots of peace and wild animals such as pheasants, rabbits, all kinds of birds, ducks, ..

name: Quiet place in the countryside near the dam and the beach
description:
We offer a cozy mobile home bell tent and pitches in the beautiful village of Graça.
It is quiet and has plenty of space to relax, hike, swim or just walk in the woods.
There is much to discover in the surrounding villages. Such as water sports, hiking tours, cycling and much more.
**Since we are under construction and there are still a few blemishes here and there, the prices are cheaper**

name: Nature campsite with swimming lake
description: Discover Camping La Brugère, an authentic nature campsite in New Aquitaine, located in the heart of the picturesque Dordogne. This campsite with private swimming lake offers a peaceful retreat at the end of a quiet road and invites you to relax in a protected environment, without barriers or flags. As an ecological campsite in the Dordogne, our commitment to sustainability is evident in our waste management policy and our support for ecological mobility. In high season, enjoy pizzas baked in a traditional wood oven and take advantage of our bread delivery service, a solution for a natural holiday in Nouvelle-Aquitaine, reducing the number of trips to the bakery. Whether you are a walker or a mountain biker, the Dordogne, with its outdoor accommodation, is full of opportunities to explore. Discover the many attractions of this unique region from the comfort of our eco-friendly campsite.

name: Camping in Lisbon's famous wine region
description:
Are you ready to escape from everyday life? We're talking about the kind of escape that takes you deep into nature, where you can sleep under the stars and wake up to the smell of fresh coffee.

If you are looking for a way to experience the Portuguese countryside with its cultural and culinary traditions then look no further than Palmela.
Portugal's famous wine region south of Lisbon is the perfect place if you want to experience nature and wine at its best. You'll stay right in the vineyards, not far from the medieval town of Palmela, perched high in the Serra da Arrabida Nature Reserve.

We offer a genuine experience for nature and wine lovers - not to mention for those who love to feast their way through Portugal!
Some of Portugal's best wines are grown here, so you can visit wineries and enjoy what they have to offer during your stay!

In the immediate vicinity you can visit a donkey sanctuary or the Quinta das Riscas - an event venue and themed garden with kangeros and zebras.
If you feel too hot in the summer, you can cool off in a small, cozy outdoor pool within walking distance. And if you want to sample some local wines or eat the famous Leitao de Pocéirao suckling pig cooked in a wood-fired oven, there are several adegas (wineries) nearby.

The area is also a great base for exploring more of Portugal - there's even a motorway nearby that takes you north and south in 15 minutes!

20 minutes you are already in the Alentejo with its unique cork oak forests; and in 25 minutes you can reach Setubal, a small fishing town with its beautiful turquoise beaches and an incredible range of fish.

But why leave when there is so much to see here?

name: Benvenuti in our Sicilian citrus orchard!
description:
We have 12 spacious RV spots in our citrus grove overlooking the valley. Our camp space is located in the Natural Park of the Alcantara River. That is why we are limited with facilities. We can somewhat offer you the experience of wild camping! There is a natural water outdoor shower and a sink. No drinking water. No electricity. There are solar lanterns. The camper place is located between orange and lemon trees with a few other fruit trees, such as fig, mulberry, olive, apricot and plum. Feel safe surrounded by the hills covered with Mediterranean vegetation and as soon as night falls under a twinkling starry sky. Because there is no light pollution, it is wonderful stargazing. Enjoying peace and quiet, being connected to nature and feeling free, that's what we stand for!

We ourselves live a few hundred meters away, going down the path. Through a gate in the orchard there you can reach the Alcantara River on foot. Ice-cold meltwater from the snow of volcano Etna flows impressively through hollowed out lava rocks. This is especially visible at the Gole d'Alcantara, a tourist spot a few kilometers away. With us, the river is hardly visited and you bathe in the intimacy of nature. The water meanders here between the trees, past scattered lava rocks and via waterfalls. It is about a 10-minute walk from the camper place; so down the path, through our garden, then through a deserted field, occasionally populated by a herd of cows, to finally arrive at the riverbed. You can go with the flow and find the necessary refreshment during the hot summers. In the winter months, the river transforms into a swirling stream of water. Explore Sicilian rural life from your motorhome. In the respective seasons you can help us or our neighbors with the picking (grapes in September, olives in November, mandarins and lemons in the winter months, apricots at the beginning of May and oranges at the end of May) or by buying products from the vegetable gardens around. For the camper guests we offer small meals of local products accompanied by home-produced wine or fruit juice. You can also use the Wi-Fi connection on our terrace. 2 km away is a bakery with an extensive range of food and drinks; by appointment it also functions as a restaurant. Opposite is a gas station with a bar where you can go for your Italian coffee or a beer. The village of Gaggi is 5 km away; here are supermarkets, a bank with ATM, bars and various shops, as well as pizzerias with delivery service. (They know where to find us!) The nearest beach is (by car) a fifteen minute drive. The picturesque town of Taormina with luxury shops and the Roman-Greek theater about 20 minutes. While Etna-North is an hour away. Sicily is very diverse and has a lot to offer and to see. Tour around with the camper and discover the island in all its facets. Then it is wonderful to arrive or return to our orchard to chill out, or simply as a stopover while traveling through. Benvenuti!

name: Camping Les Eaux Vives, a unique and enchanting place!
description:
AN EXCEPTIONAL SITE TO FIND THE PLEASURE OF ACTIVITIES IN CONTACT WITH NATURE

Chapeauroux, a peaceful village located on the border between Margeride and Pays du Velay, is the ideal place to recharge your batteries in contact with nature. Located in a preserved natural area, the village is nestled at an altitude of 750 meters, in the Haut Allier gorges, on the borders of the Allier and Chapeauroux rivers. Its impressive basaltic cirque, shaped by the Allier, offers a unique setting for outdoor activities.

Nature lovers can swim in the cool waters of the river, go hiking on the wooden paths or take the Roman roads to reach the GR 470 or the famous Stevenson path. Fishermen will be able to indulge their passion in first-class waterways offering great diversity and exceptional quality.

Chapeauroux is also renowned for white water sports such as canoeing and kayaking. The courses, offering grandiose and wild landscapes, guarantee unforgettable thrills.

In summary, Chapeauroux is a charming and peaceful little village, offering many outdoor activities in a preserved natural setting.

name: Private spot between vineyards and olive trees
description: The farm is located in the middle of the vineyards, olive groves and forests against the foothills of the Apennines at a height of about 450 meters. From the grounds you have a beautiful view over the valley of Pescia and Uzzano (province of Pistoia). You can even see Lucca and Monte Serra and on clear weather you can see a glimpse of the sea.There is a nice small swimmingpool for cooling of.

name: Lose yourself in a little French oasis
description:
Discover the magic of Le Poteau: friendly campsite and gites in Occitania, France

Come and experience the magic of Le Poteau, a small campsite and gîtes in Occitanie that promises a warm welcome and exceptional facilities. We strive to offer you a unique experience with a few little touches that make all the difference. Our aim is to ensure you have a relaxing and rewarding holiday in the Occitanie region, with just enough to keep you entertained. At Le Poteau, great friendships are formed and we pride ourselves on our friendly atmosphere in Occitania.

To enrich your stay in Occitanie, we have established partnerships with many local businesses. Some of these are available to visit during your stay in Occitanie, while others come to us to offer you an even richer experience.

Our highlights include:

Delicious meals in our orchard in Occitanie, prepared with mainly local produce
Tasting of great local wines in Occitania
Daily delivery of fresh bread and pastries in Occitanie
A small but charming swimming pool in Occitania
Weekly organic vegetable stand on site in Occitania, grown only 50 metres away
Possibility to meet a local masseuse in Occitania for unforgettable moments of relaxation
Many suggestions on places to visit and things to do in Occitanie, in this beautiful and little-known region of France
Join us at Le Poteau in Occitanie and discover a unique stay, where every detail is thought of for your comfort and satisfaction. Book now for an unforgettable holiday in our little corner of paradise in Occitania!

name: Peaceful and panoramic orchard: natural campsite in the heart of the Grand Est
description: Discover our ecological open-air campsite in the heart of the Grand Est, a nature and rural campsite with a peaceful orchard for farmers. Enjoy a unique agrotourism experience in our farm campsite. Enjoy local products and duck specialties (magrets, foie gras, chipolatas, confits, rillettes) for a gourmet camping stay with a farm in the magnificent Grand Est region.

name: Farm camping - get close to nature and animals
description: You can arrive here on foot or by bicycle directly from the Ringsted Experience Trail, and cars, campers and caravans are also very welcome. At our farm you can relax, greet the animals and perhaps find some berries or herbs to pick. There is a fire pit, outdoor kitchen and plenty of opportunities for play.

name: Peaceful and rejuvenating campsite with our donkeys - Ferme la Ravena
description:
Discover Ferme la Ravena, a haven of peace located at the entrance to a charming village in Haute-Saonois at an altitude of 310 m, offering superb panoramas in the heart of the Southern Vosges. Easy to access, our donkeys welcome you with their warm braying for an authentic experience in the heart of nature, ideal for a stay on the farm, a weekend in the countryside, a romantic getaway or an unusual family vacation.

Carole and Ghislain, passionate about nature and their region, offer you a personalized welcome in this rural gîte, accompanied by our 3 adorable donkeys and other farm animals. Enjoy moments of complicity by brushing them at will for their greatest pleasure (and yours!) and discover the family activities offered by our educational farm.

Explore the region through horseback riding, sightseeing tours and rural heritage. La Ferme la Ravena is the ideal starting point for a stay focused on green tourism, ecotourism and the discovery of nature.

The toilets:

Sanitary block open 24 hours a day with WC, washbasin, shower
Outdoor sink with drainer and hot water
Tap and jet of cold drinking water
Equipment:

Large hangar for storing bicycles, motorbikes, quads or horse-drawn carriages
Pasture with shelter to accommodate your horse (supplement) and sleep nearby
Equestrian accommodation for mountain holidays with your favorite animal
Barbecue available
Tables and benches in our "unusual barrel" and under the shed
Fridge available under the shed
Brochures with ideas for outings and activities nearby, for a relaxation and well-being experience
Book your stay at Ferme la Ravena now and experience a unique adventure in harmony with nature.

name: A Place in the Leaves - something for everyone!
description: Discover a haven of peace in the beautiful Dordogne region. Our campsite, nestled in a green setting, offers 30 grass pitches as well as charming outdoor chalets. Enjoy the warm atmosphere of the Cosy Nook, our café/terrace, where sun loungers are waiting for you to relax outdoors to the sound of lively music. With delicious food trucks, our no-frills approach will appeal to Free Spirits looking for serenity, offering a true adult backpack experience. We attach particular importance to the cleanliness of our facilities, in order to guarantee you an impeccable stay in our campsite in the Dordogne. Located just 7 km (12 minutes) from Sarlat, you will have easy access to the river, castles, gardens and bike paths, allowing you to discover all the wonders of the region. Book now and enjoy a memorable camping holiday with its open-air chalets, cosy terrace and zen atmosphere.

name: Camping at the Bischofsburg
description:
A park-like complex includes the bishop's castle Burgliebenau, located on an old arm of the Weißen Elster. Our family is restoring and reviving this castle complex from 1186 with small cultural events.

Important information

attachment
The parking space is located directly in the forest below the castle complex.

pitches
There are many large trees on level meadows, but there are also sunny spots.

The sanitary facilities
Two outdoor shower cabins with only cold water are available as showers. A bathing lake is 1 km away. Toilets are available in the house.

Furnishing
If required, short-term WiFi access can be provided in the house. Electricity is available outside.

activities
We are happy to offer an entertaining guided tour through the history of the castle for a small fee. The Wallendorder lake offers a wonderful swimming opportunity.

a notice
The freight airport Leipzig is not far away and there is frequent air traffic at irregular times. However, we have found that not everyone is bothered by it.
Since we are renovating the castle over many years, it may happen that we also carry out work near the parking spaces between 9:30 a.m. and 3:30 p.m.

name: Camping by the stream in the district of Munich
description: Since we ourselves are on the road a lot and then our huge property is just standing around empty, especially in the most beautiful summer months, which is actually a shame, we want to offer campers the opportunity with campspace to enjoy nature in the Munich district. Our fenced, beautiful garden with a large lawn, many old trees with shade, stream access directly in the garden for swimming and fishing, terrace with garden furniture and barbecue, sandpit for the kiddies, ninja slackline, large trampoline, swing, water and electricity access in the garden , offer a wonderful retreat, but in close proximity to Munich. The Unterschleißheim bathing lake can be reached in 5 minutes by car or in 10 minutes by bike.

name: Swedish idyll at the lake
description:
I have a wooden cottage in a secluded hamlet in Sweden, with a beautiful lake at bathrobe distance. I have a lush flower and vegetable garden, a colourful oasis. Also the house itself is colourful, with an interior to lift your mood.
You will find some peace of mind here, it's mainly the birds making the noise. I have hammocks at the patio, for even more relaxation.
It is a perfect spot to go hiking from, for dayhikes, or even the Bergslagsleden (280km).
The campspace is at about 20 meters from the house, so plenty of privacy.

There is electricity at the campspace. Water, toilet, shower and kitchen are inside the house.

name: Babou Maramures campsite and hostel
description: Babous campsite is situated in the garden behind our house where we have around 6000 square metres available for tents and campers. You can choose where you want to pitch your tent or place your camper. You can also make use of our hammocks to sit back and relax or make a fire at one of the fire places. The bathrooms are located in the old barn, which we renovated from the inside. At our campsite we sell some wine and beer and at 1 kilometre distance there are two small shops where you can buy basic products. Also there are two local village bars but no restaurant. For your bigger shopping or eating out, the nearest options are in Ocna ?ugatag (8 km.) of Sighetu Marma?iei (25 km.). We have a tent for rent -for a minimum stay of two nights-. In the tent, which is meant for one or two persons, you will find a double matras and bed linen. If you hire the tent, you can use the kitchen in the hostel and of course the bathrooms. From your tent youll have a great view over the mountains! A lot of activities can be done from the hostel, like hiking in the surrounding fields, forests and mountains, visit local markets and old wooden churches, take a swim in the salt baths of the neighbouring village, and best of all, observe traditional village life. You can also rent one of our mountain bikes and bike in the forest or to the neighbouring villages. If you have any other wishes, things you want to do or questions, please let us know and we will try our best to work it out! Our access road: The last 900 metres through the village are on an unpaved road, which means the road is covered with gravel and small stones. For cars, this is no problem, we drive here every day. Small campers and caravans also can reach our campsite, although we advise you to slow down your speed to a minimum. After all, it are only 900 metres. Unfortunately, the road is not suited for caravans. Campers up untill 6 metres in lenght can reach our place.

name: Farm camping at the AUER
description:
It is quiet and you have a great view. A campfire site with barbecue facilities is available. A bathroom with shower and toilet in the courtyard is available. Dexter cattle live on the farm as suckler cows, as well as dwarf rabbits and goats. Unfortunately, the chemical toilet cannot be emptied in the courtyard.
NEW: Let us pamper you. Wellness/massages possible directly at the farm. When booking, our guests get a 15% discount on the regular price. Just stop by at Seelenstreichler Samerberg.

name: Camping at our mini campsite among the horses on the edge of the Eendenkooi nature reserve
description:
Mini campsite with 15 camping pitches. Motorhome camping, tents, caravans. Caravan for rent and B&B rooms

Pony riding for children up to 12 years. At 3 nights pony rides if you help to take care of the horses.

Ride tough like a cowboy with a western saddle

Various courses with our ponies and horses, such as horse whispering and horse coaching, meditation, reiki, healing for adults.

Camping among our horses and ponies. Coaching conversations.
Beautiful walking and cycling routes through the Betuwe and the river area.

Many attractions in the area.
Like ;
The Duck Decoy Nature Reserve in Waardenburg
Tennis court Waardenburg
Estate Marienweerdt
Neerijnen Castle
Canoeing on the Linge
Go-kart track Zaltbommel
Swimming pool Geldermalsen
Swimming pool Zaltbommel

And of course much more.

Prices camping;
€18.50 for 1 person
with 1 car, caravan or camper, motorcycle or tent, 2 cyclists with tent, including 16 ampere electricity, environmental tax, VAT, including
tourist tax € 1.50 per night per person

B&B rooms 1 person €105,- including breakfast
2 persons€115,- including breakfast

name: Short break/spa vacation in Bruchhausen-Vilsen
description:
Don't feel like "close to close" either?

With the mobile home you actually book freedom and individuality and in the end you are back in "row house style". I offer you an individual and private camper place in the Xanadi Heilehaus in the climatic health resort of Bruchhausen-Vilsen/Wöpse. My pitch is suitable for self-sufficient campers and offers a break from everyday life. Here it is important to find peace and quiet in nature.

Activities in the region:

Walks and long bike tours in Sellingsloh, which is right on the doorstep, are ideal. In addition, the Vilser-Holz (fitness trail/spa gardens/concerts) and the beautiful surrounding area can only be warmly recommended. The town of Bruchhausen-Vilsen has many leisure activities, a small town center and restaurants and events for every taste and age.

name: Small and colorful campsite with alpacas
description: On the edge of National Park Weerribben-Wieden, situated on an idyllic country road. That's where our small-scale and cheerful pearl of a campsite is located. Between the wooded banks and in the middle of nature. A place for bon vivants where alpacas, the outdoors, conviviality and relaxation are central and where holiday happiness begins. The place where you come to stay if you are looking for a personal and attractive stay, away from the masses. A place where everyone is welcome and where you can be yourself. Looking for a catered adventure? Our attractive accommodations are ready for you! Would you rather come with your own (roof) tent, camper van, caravan or folding trailer? Choose one of the spacious camping spots and enjoy! Will we see you soon?

name: Light Tree Camp
description:
The last great forests of Europe invite you

in untouched nature with crystal clear rivers, natural waterfalls and
fairytale hiking trails for young and old.

Our small, protected family campsite awaits you in the middle of wooded mountains (the last primeval forest in Europe).

The terrain is easily passable for vehicles with ample ground clearance.

The idyllic peace, paired with the sounds of the animals in the surrounding forest, the murmur of the nearby springs where you can relax, make this place a nature experience.

A campfire site in the center of the free space and hammocks on the meadow orchard pull you out of the familiar everyday life and lead you back into your primal connection - the natural cycle.

A shower and washing machine are available for use.

A rustic composting toilet is available a little away from the maximum of 10 camping pitches.

In an absolutely secluded location, exploring the area by hiking is an adventure with a 360-degree all-round view of the Bosnian wooded mountain landscape.

The spring water springs from a natural stone basin directly on our farm, which freshly drunk invigorates the spirit and cleanses the body.

We also offer freshly baked bread every day, as well as homemade and refined alcoholic drinks (liqueurs, fruit brandy...), cakes, jams, our own honey, organic eggs from the farm and much more.

All of the animals that live on the farm are tame and are especially fun for children.

name: nomad on the farm
description: Sleep next to dwarf goats, under century-old trees, view of the ribatejana nature next to a stream and a Zen ornamental pond, lulled by the song of birds, crickets and other cicadas.

name: Family campsite in the heart of a preserved vineyard - Chez Franck et Sophie
description: Come and spend an unforgettable holiday in the heart of unspoiled nature, in our peaceful family campsite nestled in the heart of a magnificent vineyard in New Aquitaine. We offer you a quiet location for a quiet and relaxing holiday, with a multitude of outdoor activities for the whole family. Discover the pleasures of hiking or cycling, go on a sightseeing tour or even enjoy a wine tasting to discover the local gastronomy. Our campsite invites you to relaxation and well-being, for a rejuvenating stay in the middle of unspoiled landscapes. Book now for a worry-free holiday!

name: Ideal for those who like to sleep under the stars with the sound of the river. .
description:
The campsite extends completely along the river and thus allows you to view Kolpa directly from your tent, campsite-trailer or camper van.

All camping sites are spacious and are located on a grassy lawn under the canopy of trees. Our guests can choose their favorite camping area. You can choose from a shady or sunny location as you wish.

All camping sites are close to the toilet, sports and children's playground, restaurants and reception.

New pitches are available for caravans and motorhomes.

The pitches are paved and spacious, equipped with electricity, water and drainage, close to equipped toilet facilities and with the possibility of a campervan drop-off (Chem WC).

name: Domain of Villateux
description:
Campsite located in the countryside.
Ideal quiet place to relax.
Possible excursions in the surroundings.

name: Beautiful campsite in Drenthe 700m from camp Westerbork
description:
Our campsite in Drenthe is uniquely situated in nature and close to a historically charged place: the memorial center of the former Westerbork camp. The name of our campsite (“Tikvah”) was therefore not chosen by chance and means 'Hope' in Hebrew. Our campsite is located in the middle of nature and has pitches of up to 250 m2. From the campsite you walk directly into the forest and onto the heath "Het Groot Zand". A visit to camp Westerbork is very worthwhile (also very suitable for children). Guided tours are given every day. The museum is highly recommended for those who want to know more about Jewish history and life in the camp during World War II.
There is a cycle path in front of the campsite and various hiking trails behind the campsite where your dog is also allowed to run loose in the woods!

name: lyssenthoek farm
description: A small-scale campsite with 11 pitches with water and electricity. There is also a sanitary block. We are located near the French border and an hour's drive from the coast. We are in the charming countryside yet a stone's throw from the city. There is something for everyone here, both nature and culture.

name: Vacation at the holiday farm
description: In the middle of the green you can experience a few relaxing days in complete peace. Just a few meters from your pitch is our holiday farm, where rescued animals of all kinds find a home. There is a lot to experience here for young and old. Donkey hikes, riding lessons and much more.

name: Calm and nature near the landing beaches
description: Come and recharge your batteries in a peaceful green setting surrounded by nature near the landing beaches, cycle in the countryside and enjoy the magnificent cycle route along the beaches.

name: Motorhome area in the middle of nature with river and waterfall
description:
Welcome to our private motorhome and bivouac area in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, located in the heart of nature with a river and a waterfall nearby. Take advantage of a peaceful and green setting to recharge your batteries and spend one or more nights in nature camping in our establishment.

We offer motorhome pitches and bivouac areas from €10/night, including tourist tax. Visitor access is €1/person, while picnics are offered at €2/adult for site maintenance. Children under 12 can picnic for free.

Our place is protected and private, thus offering a unique and authentic experience in the middle of nature with waterfall, motorhome, bivouac and outdoor stay. To access our site, please introduce yourself to Mr. Guigues, our owner. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information or to book your stay with us.

name: Wild flower meadow at the Ihler forest
description:
There is not only water and electricity here, but also a romantic swing on an old oak tree and occasional visits from deer from the nearby forest.
This campspace is close to shops, the Ihler Meer and still has an unobstructed view.

name: Small-scale campsite with a beautiful view
description:
You will find our campsite just below the Vosges in the Haute-Saône. Adjacent to a large forest and located on a hill. You can enjoy the peace, space, silence and nature here.
The upper area is intended for tents, folding trailers and small camper vans. You can spend the night with a caravan or motorhome on the terrain below. There are many shady places. Some have a nice view over the hilly landscape.
You will find a sanitary building on both the upper and lower grounds. The water for the showers is heated by solar panels and the toilets are flushed with rainwater.
In the area you can swim in the river Saône, go shopping in Vesoul, cycle through the hilly landscape or enjoy good food in a beautiful location.
In the morning we have bread service and the bar is open daily for a drink.

name: Farm camping in the Lüneburg Heath
description:
Agricamping on the farm:

Warm welcome. I offer you a self-sufficient and private tent and camper place with electricity on a well-kept farm in a quiet location. Perfect to relax and unwind. Fresh water and WiFi incl.
In the small regional farm shop you can buy eggs, pasta, potatoes, meat, jam and sausages within walking distance (Hof Brockmann, Weißenkamp).

The perfect starting point:

Attention active vacationers! There is a lot to discover in the area. Various tourist activities such as Heide Park Soltau, Weltvogelpark Walsrode, Serengeti Park Hodenhagen, Felto-Filzwelt, Soltau Therme, golf course, various museums can be reached within a maximum driving time of 30 minutes. The region is also ideal for cycling tours to Soltau or Riensheide. It is just 5 km to Soltau and approx. 10 km to Dorfmark.

See you soon!

name: Nice camping in the forest by the alpine river Savinja
description:
Forest Camping in the village of Loke at town Mozirje is a charming campsite in the middle of forest offering various types of accommodations, pitches with electricity for tents, campers, vans, trailers and creative experience of outdoor leisure activities amidst magnificent nature.
The whole campsite is located in NATURA 2000 area, so there for any stereo music is not allowed in the campsite at any time of the stay. Music of the nature surroundings and its animals will bring you even more satisfaction.

Bathing in the river that flows by the site is virtually impossible to resist, offering perfect refreshment. In addition to accommodation, we also offer a varied range of sports activities, while the easy going types may prefer to relax in the tree crowns, perhaps with a book from our unique library set up for the bookworms among our guests.
The guests can meet and mingle in different common areas. One is an open air fireplace for grilling or for evening socialising; the other is roofed and includes a fully equipped kitchen where you can get your first morning coffee or tea from our herb garden, as well as any other little thing you may have forgotten to take with you. Is there anything better than grilling a trout against the background music of guitar and rustling of the river?
Toilets are located near the accomodations area. The area of Forest camping has Wi-Fi internet access, a mobile stage for events and workshops, a mini library, and several sports facilities (backetball playground, small football playground)– all you need to get up close and personal with nature.
Our offer involves a range of sports activities suitable for guests of all ages. At the campsite, you can play volleyball or speed badminton (or speedminton), put your balance to test in slacklining or rent a bicycle to discover the surroundings.
Working with the local company, we also organize activities for the adrenaline persons: whitewater rafting, canyoning, kayaking, paragliding, and many others.
Our mission is rounded off with an adjusted offer and organization of a variety of theme-based, arts or popular workshops. There is also a children's playground with a sensory box and many games for our youngest guests.

name: Cycling, walking, enjoying and relaxing at Camping Lagoudalie
description:
Welcome to the nature campsite Lagoudalie in Dégagnac, located in the Lot in France, on the border of the Dordogne. Surrounded by an impressive nature rich in famous villages and tourist sites, our Lagoudalie campsite is the ideal starting point for excursions to must-see destinations such as Sarlat, Roque Gageac, Rocamadour or Cougnac or Lascaux in Occitanie. You can choose from our 25 spacious pitches of 200 m2 each, shaded or sunny, to install your tent, caravan or motorhome. For those looking for a little more comfort, we also offer three fully equipped vacation homes for rent, on our 10-acre property with beautiful views and a variety of wooded and open lands.

As a cycling campsite for many years, we are proud of our hilly region that offers many opportunities for cycling, mountain biking and electric bicycles, for cycling enthusiasts. We also offer a range of activities to suit all tastes, such as hiking, canoeing, via ferrata or climbing in the forest, for those who prefer a more active holiday.

Our sanitary building was completely renovated in 2023 and offers modern facilities of high quality. You can also enjoy our large swimming pool with bar and cozy terrace to relax and enjoy the sun.

In short, if you are looking for a spacious and quiet nature campsite with a relaxed atmosphere and many activities nearby, look no further: Our Lagoudalie campsite is the perfect place for you. Book now for an unforgettable stay in the Lot in France, in Occitanie.

name: View of the countryside in the Unterallgäu
description:
Idyllic parking space in the Lower Allgäu

Welcome to our quiet and idyllic parking space on the outskirts with a wide view of the countryside! Our meadow pitch is ideal for tents, caravans, van der motorhomes, you will find a power connection and drinking water. You are cordially invited to end the evening with a campfire. We also welcome four-legged friends. We have fresh baked goods on site every Wednesday and Saturday! Thanks to our fruit and vegetable garden, there is a free guest gift (if seasonally available).

Excursions in the area

Our parking space offers the perfect starting point for numerous excursion destinations in the immediate vicinity (Therme Bad Wörishofen, Skyline Park Bad Wörishofen, historic old town of Memmingen and Mindelheim, Katzbrui mill with beer garden, Mindeltal cycle path and much more). The town of Landsberg am Lech (approx. 30 km) and the Ammersee (approx. 60 km) can also be easily reached by car.

A field path begins 50m from the parking space, which can be the starting point for numerous walks and bike tours.

name: Nice camping in the forest by the alpine river Savinja
description:
Forest Camping in the village of Loke at town Mozirje is a charming campsite in the middle of forest offering various types of accommodations, pitches with electricity for tents, campers, vans, trailers and creative experience of outdoor leisure activities amidst magnificent nature.
The whole campsite is located in NATURA 2000 area, so there for any stereo music is not allowed in the campsite at any time of the stay. Music of the nature surroundings and its animals will bring you even more satisfaction.

Bathing in the river that flows by the site is virtually impossible to resist, offering perfect refreshment. In addition to accommodation, we also offer a varied range of sports activities, while the easy going types may prefer to relax in the tree crowns, perhaps with a book from our unique library set up for the bookworms among our guests.
The guests can meet and mingle in different common areas. One is an open air fireplace for grilling or for evening socialising; the other is roofed and includes a fully equipped kitchen where you can get your first morning coffee or tea from our herb garden, as well as any other little thing you may have forgotten to take with you. Is there anything better than grilling a trout against the background music of guitar and rustling of the river?
Toilets are located near the accomodations area. The area of Forest camping has Wi-Fi internet access, a mobile stage for events and workshops, a mini library, and several sports facilities (backetball playground, small football playground)– all you need to get up close and personal with nature.
Our offer involves a range of sports activities suitable for guests of all ages. At the campsite, you can play volleyball or speed badminton (or speedminton), put your balance to test in slacklining or rent a bicycle to discover the surroundings.
Working with the local company, we also organize activities for the adrenaline persons: whitewater rafting, canyoning, kayaking, paragliding, and many others.
Our mission is rounded off with an adjusted offer and organization of a variety of theme-based, arts or popular workshops. There is also a children's playground with a sensory box and many games for our youngest guests.

name: Rural campsite in Gironde, in the heart of a vineyard - Discover the secrets of wine production
description: Located in the heart of the Domaine de Brandeau family vineyard and near the prestigious Château la Peyraude near Bordeaux, our rural campsite is the ideal place for an authentic wine-growing stay. Discover the secrets of wine production on a guided tour of our winery, or enjoy outdoor activities such as nature walks and wine tastings. Our ecological campsite offers a nature escape with ease and tranquility, ideal for lovers of ecotourism and countryside holidays. Book now your wine discovery stay in our family vineyard and enjoy an unforgettable experience of camping on the farm.

name: Camping in the high mountains in Auvergne: enjoy a holiday surrounded by nature!
description: Le Domaine, a family campsite in Savoie, offers holidays in the heart of nature on a human scale for nature camping holidays in Auvergne. Discover our 24 camping pitches, 9 unusual accommodations and 5 comfortable chalets that can accommodate up to 7 people for family holidays in the high mountains. Enjoy a panoramic view of the upper valley of the villages of Arves, at the foot of the Col de la Croix de Fer, and 300m from a pretty body of water with spring water for a stay focused on hiking. Our southern exposure will allow you to enjoy maximum sunshine and go hiking or practice the activities offered in the resort for an active holiday. Relaxation, active holidays, sports, leisure or idleness, we listen to your desires for a successful holiday in Auvergne

name: Camping at the fresh air gallery "Fischerdiek.3" in the middle of Lower Saxony
description:
A picturesque parking space near the fresh air gallery "Fischerdiek.3" in the middle of Lower Saxony. Here regional artists present their works on a meadow. From spring to autumn everyone is cordially invited to stroll between the weatherproof pictures.

In the immediate vicinity of the "Sellingsloh" forest and nature reserve, a single parking space is provided privately:

A few meters from the edge of the forest on a green area under trees.

Not far from the state road, the site is very easy to reach.

Very natural environment and lots of rest. Ideal as a starting point for hikes/walks and bike or motorbike tours.

The "middle of Lower Saxony" is about 4 km away. In addition, the "Weserradweg" passes nearby.

Guests for the parking space are asked to register before arrival. If the parking space is not occupied or reserved, registration is also possible at very short notice.

name: Beautifully located campsite in the hills of the Alentejo, Portugal.
description: A beautifully situated campsite on the river Mira for fishing or swimming. Furthermore, the area offers a lot of nature and you can endlessly walk & cycle here. Various car routes to all sights in Southern Portugal. Our campsite is centrally located in southern Portugal, 10 km south of Ourique. A city with a lot of historical values, including Castro da Cola.

name: Former mill in the 3-country corner of the Bavarian Forest
description:
Welcome to the mountains:

The former Bachmühle is located directly on the Goldsteig long-distance hiking trail (stage N22) at the edge of the forest. Our tent and camper place is equipped with fresh drinking water and (cold) shower. Electricity costs extra, but we are happy to provide you with a charcoal grill, seats and tables. Four-legged friends are also very welcome.

This is what you can experience with us:

The area is ideal for long hikes, walks and bike rides. The beautiful panoramic mountain Breitenberg is a long ridge in the Bavarian part of the Tannheim mountains. The Ostlerhütte is enthroned at the summit. In the neighborhood is a ski jump and a chapel. A small hike away is a bathing pond and the weaving museum. Pure idyll!

name: Back to Basics : Off grid in the Belgian Limburg nature
description:
This year we again offer 10 pop up camper pitches on our domain de Krieckaert in Gellik Lanaken.

This park is pure nature and absolute tranquility at the entrance of the Hoge Kempen National Park and a stone's throw from Maastricht.

Come take a walk in our park. You will experience the peace, hear the birds chirping and enjoy the healthy air and the beautiful view. De Krieckaert is a park like no other : we are chosen by lovers of absolute peace and nature who opt for a back to basics experience. On the other hand, the park is located a stone's throw from bustling Maastricht with its many shopping and culinary options.

Taverne de Krieckaert will spoil you with a very affordable kitchen and tasty drinks, both on the cozy terrace and in the form of takeout.

Attention: no water or electricity is provided on our pop-up pitches

For more information about the location and the atmosphere of the park, please visit the Krieckaert website

name: Small-scale campsite with a beautiful view
description:
You will find our campsite just below the Vosges in the Haute-Saône. Adjacent to a large forest and located on a hill. You can enjoy the peace, space, silence and nature here.
The upper area is intended for tents, folding trailers and small camper vans. You can spend the night with a caravan or motorhome on the terrain below. There are many shady places. Some have a nice view over the hilly landscape.
You will find a sanitary building on both the upper and lower grounds. The water for the showers is heated by solar panels and the toilets are flushed with rainwater.
In the area you can swim in the river Saône, go shopping in Vesoul, cycle through the hilly landscape or enjoy good food in a beautiful location.
In the morning we have bread service and the bar is open daily for a drink.

name: Patricia Gamping Montholier: nature stay in Gamping in the Jura
description:
Discover another way to discover a region by staying at Patricia Gamping Montholier, located in the Jura 39 and only 10 km from Poligny and Arbois. Take advantage of a magical and simple place in harmony with nature to camp with the locals. Meet amazing people and create lasting friendships.
Our Gamping Jura is ideal for simple holidays in a motorhome, caravan, van or tent. Since 2013, our site has been welcoming campers in an exceptional natural setting, for a nature stay in the Jura. In 2019, we created the first sanitary block for your comfort, and in 2020, we fitted out a stabilized part to accommodate motorhomes. In 2022, we have refurbished the entrance and the toilets, created a bowling green, pizza ovens and many other things to discover.
We accept pets, kept on a leash for the good of all, for your stay in a Jura motorhome. We are surrounded by many places to discover, which we will be happy to show you during your stay with us. Contact us for any questions and come and live a unique experience with us, by choosing our Gamping Jura for your nature stay in the Jura. See you soon at Patricia Gamping Montholier!

name: Quiet rural area near the Hoogwatergeul
description:
Small-scale camping spots in a beautiful walking / cycling environment. There are also plenty of rivers in the vicinity where beautiful fishing spots have been created. You can also enjoy canoeing between the bird meadows.

In the winter period from October 31 to April 1, the showers and toilets are not available. There is tap water and electricity

name: Close to the forest edge, with a fire pit a place all for you / you alone
description:
Unique: you are always the only one here! This is because we think it is important that you are alone, with your friends, partner or family. No caravans or tents around you that you don't know, but wonderfully private. If you want to stay here with several family members, a large group or with friends, we need to discuss this. However, there is no other way to do this via Campspace than to first make a booking (if necessary, you can wait to pay) that way you can write a message to us. There is enough space for groups. Only we would like to know a little more, what is the intention of the outing? As you might expect: groups of friends who want to get drunk and play music, they better keep looking ;)

A caravan with a tent for a child or something like that. we simply count as 1, of course you do not have to pay extra for that. It is a beautiful location on the edge of the forest, a beautiful place with many birds. We sometimes camp in the backyard ourselves, because it is just very beautiful.

Please note, the house is close to the highway, so you will unfortunately hear it. It is important to be aware of this to avoid setbacks. Are you a very light sleeper? Then bring earplugs just to be sure.

There is firewood available, but it consists of scrap wood and old branches that have been sawn off, this is outside. Or, it's not perfect. Most people use this and that's okay too, that's fine, :) but if you want really good wood I would advise you to bring your own. The prunings are just in the garden, you can find this messy, but this ensures that hedgehogs and other animals can find a nice spot if they want and we think that's more important than how it looks :).

Fun to do in the area:

Nature and Veluwe:
• Do you want to walk into the forest as quickly as possible: navigate to 'visitors entrance Reeenbergweg' in Beekbergen, the forest is 400 meters away :)
Posbank
•Kootwijkerzand and radio Kootwijk
• Loenermark
•Walking with marked routes using arrows: 'The dense hole' in Loenen.
Waterfall Loenen

Amusement park:
• Julianators

petting zoo:
• Malkenschoten in apeldoorn
Landal Greenparks on the Hogebergweg in Beekbergen (walking distance).

Museums
•Kroller Moller Museum
•Open Air Museum Arnhem
•CODA museum apeldoorn
•Paleis het loo apeldoorn
•Apenheul Apeldoorn
•Burgerszoo Arnhem

Towns:
•Arnhem
•Apeldoorn

Restaurants:
•Spacious
•Egg of Columbus

In other words: plenty of fun things to discover :)

name: Idyllic natural camping near Ulm
description:
Pure nature:

We offer you a child-friendly parking space in the countryside on the meadow on our private agricultural property directly on site. Camping is suitable for self-sufficient vehicles. Please arrive by 6 p.m. and follow the current hygiene rules. We offer you a bread roll service if you order the day before until 11 a.m. Cool off in the ankle-deep small stream in front of the front door, experience fantastic sunsets and pure nature.

In the near vicinity:

The bakery vehicle is in town on Tuesdays and Saturdays. It is just 2.8 km to the city center, where you will find the train station, bakers, butchers, supermarkets, the public outdoor pool and numerous recommended restaurants. The nearest inn in town is easily accessible on foot.

Excursions:

Great for children is Legoland Günzburg, which you can reach in just 20 minutes by car. Also in 20 minutes by car you are in Ulm and around Ulm and around Ulm! (Or take the fast direct connection from Weissenhorn train station instead). Be sure to visit the Steiff Museum in Heidenheim.

For more information, please contact the host...

Welcome!

name: Charming Oasis for Nature Lovers
description:
Monte das Louzeiras is located near the Spanish border, between Seville (180km) Serpa (16km) in the Serra Adiça nestled in a 40 ha olive grove with trees around 300 years old and a vineyard. On the farm you will also find sheep, horses, dogs, cats, geese, chickens, peacocks an ostrich and much more. We produce our wine in amphorae and oak barrels. In our store you can find besides wine: olive oil, piri piri, honeys, cosmetic products from olive oil, vinegars and flavored salts and oils. We are a family business with Swiss and Portuguese roots and welcome you from the end of April until the end of October.

In our park/garden we offer breakfast, petisco (local snacks) or even a barbecue. You are welcome to use the pool with terrace as well as the spacious patio surrounded by orange trees. We will be happy to serve you our wines or other drinks at sunset.

On the nearby river Guadiana with the gorge Pulo do Lobo or the Alqueva, the largest reservoir in Europe, you can discover the impressive landscapes by canoe or boat. On foot you can reach the small village of Vale de Vargo. With a 30 min drive you can reach the small town of Serpa where you can visit cultural events or museums. It is considered the capital of the Cante Alentejano, a traditional choral singing of the region recognized by UNESCO as Cultural Heritage of Humanity since 2014.

name: 'On the meadow': camping with a touch of comfort!
description:
Need rest, time to come to yourself and still want some extras? Then you've come to the right place!
On our 1ha meadow you will find ponies, chickens, cats and rabbits, where we love a little comfort in addition to the beauty of nature. A caravan is provided in which you can prepare a basic meal or provide shelter from the sun or rain.
You can laze in the hammock, swing seat or lounge chair or enjoy a game of Kubb, pétanque or other board games that you will find in the caravan.
If you want, you can take care of the animals, look for cherries on the tree, pick grapes from the bush or snack on the goodies in the conservatory.
There is a BBQ where, in addition to baking meat, you can also prepare pizzas.
You can end the evening with a marshmallow over the fire pit!
However, much more is possible!
We offer additional activities such as initiation archery, blowpipe shooting, ground work with the ponies, initiation horse language, team building exercises, petanque, pool, darts, slackline…
So make it a real men's weekend, a relaxed ladies' weekend, a family or team building weekend or a combination of all of this. Everything is possible!
Let us know in advance and we will make the necessary arrangements.
If you like to be pampered, breakfast and/or dinner can be provided by caterer den Did. This is delivered to the caravan. Put it in your email and we'll look at your wishes further.

Our meadow is located 2 km from Wijgmaal station. If you are passing through, we can pick you up at the station.
Both in Rotselaar and in Wijgmaal (both located 2 km from the meadow) you will find shops, a bakery, a chip shop and an ATM.

Want to discover our place?
Then we hope to welcome you soon!

name: Sleeping peacefully in the meadow
description:
Our campsite is located in rural Kinrooi, a stone's throw from the Dutch border.

For the sports enthusiasts, there is the beautiful Limburg cycling route network that winds past our farm through the Maas valley. Our campsite overlooks the large Maasplassen, which can please any water lover. You can take beautiful walks, swimming, sailing, kayaking, supping, (kyte) surfing, fishing….

The Dutch town of Thorn is a few kilometers from our campsite. This picturesque white town is definitely worth a visit. Explore the area on foot, by bike or even with a golf cart and discover the unique spots in our beautiful Meuse region. Visit our asparagus growers and strawberry plantations or taste the top wines of Domein Aldeneyck. Enjoy our delicious regional products in the nearby restaurants, or you can cook your own meal with the products from our own farm vending machines.

name: Peaceful campsite in Auvergne: nature immersion & ecotourism
description: Stay in our ecological farm campsite in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, nestled in the heart of a charming hamlet in the middle of the mountains. Immerse yourself in unspoiled mountain nature and live an authentic ecotourism experience in this picturesque hamlet. Take advantage of countless regional hiking trails to explore the magnificent landscapes of the region in peace. Our mountain campsite is the ideal place for nature and adventure enthusiasts, offering an authentic farm stay. Don't miss this unforgettable experience!

name: parking and camping, it doesn't have to be simpler.
description:
you park at the large es, at the highest point of the meadow and at dusk you can enjoy the setting sun in the distance.

The site is a good 3ha in total, a bee hall, a food forest and at 800m you can eat fresh ice cream from the farmer.

**View Oakland vzw on fb to understand our mission**

name: Aqui tocamos las estrellas!!
description: Entorno excepcional, cerca de playa y montaña.

name: Ecological stay: savor authentic fruits and unspoiled nature
description: Discover this peaceful and rejuvenating rural area for an ecological nature camping stay, offering pitches for tents, motorhomes and unusual accommodation in Native American teepees. Immerse yourself in a preserved environment, without nearby urbanization.

name: The place for peace seekers and nature lovers!
description:
'Le Peyret Bas' - restored farmhouse and peaceful campsite in the hills of Villefranche-du-Périgord (Périgord Noir)

Discover 'Le Peyret Bas', an authentic farmhouse partially restored, located in the beautiful hills around Villefranche-du-Périgord, in the heart of the Périgord Noir. This haven of peace offers an ideal environment to relax in tranquility, enjoy the sun, nature, clean air and local culinary delights. Located in the southeast of the Dordogne, on the border of the departments of Lot and Lot-et-Garonne, 'Le Peyret Bas' is an excellent base for cycling, walking, canoeing, horse riding, visits to flea markets, castles, museums, medieval villages and picturesque towns.

The land of 'Le Peyret Bas' covers 5.5 hectares and offers a gently sloping meadow and forest with majestic beech, oak and chestnut trees, as well as an old farmhouse converted into a charming holiday home for 4 to 5 people.

You will be enchanted by the murder of the stream that meanders through the forest, fed by a spring located upstream. Spacious camping pitches, in the shade of trees and on the edge of the forest, are arranged in such a way that you can enjoy a real Eldorado of peace and space. The set exudes a rustic charm that will seduce you.

Book your stay now at our quiet campsite 'Le Peyret Bas' and dive into a true haven of peace in the heart of the Périgord Noir, in Villefranche-du-Périgord.

name: Camping under Apple Trees
description: Welcome to our campspace where you can rest under old apple trees. We are located not far away from Vilnius, so if you are looking forward to enjoy the peace of nature after a busy city visit, you are more than welcome here. And the area around us has a lot to offer as well: A lake to take a swim, a mediveal castle and you can climb the highest point of Lithuania. There is a small shop in walking distance and we are more than happy to share our fruits, herbs and hammocks with you and to listen to your stories at a campfire.

name: A beatiful and quite place surrounded by olive trees and mountains
description:
Spectacular garden with pergola, ideal for unique moments with family and friends. It has an atmosphere surrounded by nature and mountains for total relaxation and tranquillity.

We offer for your best stay a chillout area with sofas, hammock, barbecue, private toilet, wifi, volleyball court, giant screen cinema, wireless bluetooth speaker.

I will be happy to answer your questions, doubts or without obligation to come and see it "it impresses more than in photos.

name: Ecological stay: savor authentic fruits and unspoiled nature
description: Discover this peaceful and rejuvenating rural area for an ecological nature camping stay, offering pitches for tents, motorhomes and unusual accommodation in Native American teepees. Immerse yourself in a preserved environment, without nearby urbanization.

name: Campsite in Brittany: Enjoy absolute calm on the banks of the Aulne
description: If you are looking for a peaceful and isolated place for a holiday away from tourists in Brittany, come to Argol, a commune often overlooked due to the absence of a beach in the immediate vicinity. You will be able to enjoy many hikes in the Breton nature, in particular towards the Menez Hom, the harbor of Brest or even the GR34, which will take you to the very end of the Crozon peninsula. If you're looking to get away from the stresses of city life, our tranquil location is perfect for you to completely relax and rejuvenate. However, keep in mind that 3G works well depending on weather conditions and wind direction, so don't rely too much on streaming or video conferencing to stay connected and come reconnect with nature instead!😉

name: 'On the meadow': camping with a touch of comfort!
description:
Need rest, time to come to yourself and still want some extras? Then you've come to the right place!
On our 1ha meadow you will find ponies, chickens, cats and rabbits, where we love a little comfort in addition to the beauty of nature. A caravan is provided in which you can prepare a basic meal or provide shelter from the sun or rain.
You can laze in the hammock, swing seat or lounge chair or enjoy a game of Kubb, pétanque or other board games that you will find in the caravan.
If you want, you can take care of the animals, look for cherries on the tree, pick grapes from the bush or snack on the goodies in the conservatory.
There is a BBQ where, in addition to baking meat, you can also prepare pizzas.
You can end the evening with a marshmallow over the fire pit!
However, much more is possible!
We offer additional activities such as initiation archery, blowpipe shooting, ground work with the ponies, initiation horse language, team building exercises, petanque, pool, darts, slackline…
So make it a real men's weekend, a relaxed ladies' weekend, a family or team building weekend or a combination of all of this. Everything is possible!
Let us know in advance and we will make the necessary arrangements.
If you like to be pampered, breakfast and/or dinner can be provided by caterer den Did. This is delivered to the caravan. Put it in your email and we'll look at your wishes further.

Our meadow is located 2 km from Wijgmaal station. If you are passing through, we can pick you up at the station.
Both in Rotselaar and in Wijgmaal (both located 2 km from the meadow) you will find shops, a bakery, a chip shop and an ATM.

Want to discover our place?
Then we hope to welcome you soon!

name: Sloping meadow
description:
Pure nature between Crailsheim and Bad Mergentheim in the pristine Ette Valley.
18000 square meters of land with brook, slope, large meadow, huge old walnut tree with seating underneath, partially fenced property for dogs.
Bad Mergentheim wildlife park, Rothenburg ob der Tauber, valleys such as Jaggsttal, Kochertal and various smaller ones nearby.
Chickens, cats and dog brownies are already on the farm.
More animals are to follow.

name: Nature meets luxury - camping with a view and tranquillity
description:
Fancy an adventure in an oasis of peace with an exclusive location?
There are 2 parking spaces, which are spatially separated from each other and are each occupied by only one vehicle. This guarantees you a lot of privacy and tranquility.

Pitch 1 in the courtyard with electricity, fresh water and WiFi included

Pitch 2 on a hill (about 250m from the farm)

Both places allow a great panoramic view of the Bavarian Forest.

Here you will find space and time just for you in the middle of the nature of the Bavarian Forest.

The perfect place to relax - sunrise included. Space and privacy, directly surrounded by meadows and forests, at the end of a 38-inhabitant village (no through road).

high up? Summiteer?

Exactly what you make of your stay here is entirely up to you. Do you like being active? The Bavarian Forest with Germany's first national park is a paradise for hikers and mountain bikers. Check off your summit list: Großer Arber (1456m), Großer Rachel (1453m), Lusen (1373m) - with breathtaking views and unique, untouched nature. In summer there are numerous bathing lakes nearby to soak up the sun. Are you in relaxation mode: chill in or on the camper

Insider tips from host Christian:

Great hikes directly from the pitch: to the Wackelstein or to the deserted, mystical mountain village of Heimbrechtsreuth. The must-sees of the mountains: Großer Falkenstein, Großer Rachel and Brotjacklriegel. The excellent home-style Bavarian cuisine (please reserve by phone): Kammbräu Zenting, Re(h)serviert Frauenau. The old town walk including Ortsspitz and Feste Oberhaus in Passau. In summer: swimming in the Ebenreuther See (3 minutes by car from the mountain spot). MTB route of the Trans-Bayerwald: Spiegelau - Zwieslerwaldhaus (with the forest railway back to Spiegelau)

name: Serra da Estrela, mountain area in the center of Portugal
description:
Come and camp on our beautiful campsite surrounded by the mountains.
We cook for our guests. We have are own garden and use the vegetables and spices in the kitchen. Our chickens eat the leftovers of the kitchen and they give us eggs.

name: Quiet land in the Ardennes, with a view of the village.
description: Quiet, sun-exposed land with shaded location, easy access for any vehicle. Drinking water 100 meters from the owner. Brazier and wood available on site. Barbeque available. Self-contained location. No toilet or shower.

name: Babou Maramures campsite and hostel
description: Babous campsite is situated in the garden behind our house where we have around 6000 square metres available for tents and campers. You can choose where you want to pitch your tent or place your camper. You can also make use of our hammocks to sit back and relax or make a fire at one of the fire places. The bathrooms are located in the old barn, which we renovated from the inside. At our campsite we sell some wine and beer and at 1 kilometre distance there are two small shops where you can buy basic products. Also there are two local village bars but no restaurant. For your bigger shopping or eating out, the nearest options are in Ocna ?ugatag (8 km.) of Sighetu Marma?iei (25 km.). We have a tent for rent -for a minimum stay of two nights-. In the tent, which is meant for one or two persons, you will find a double matras and bed linen. If you hire the tent, you can use the kitchen in the hostel and of course the bathrooms. From your tent youll have a great view over the mountains! A lot of activities can be done from the hostel, like hiking in the surrounding fields, forests and mountains, visit local markets and old wooden churches, take a swim in the salt baths of the neighbouring village, and best of all, observe traditional village life. You can also rent one of our mountain bikes and bike in the forest or to the neighbouring villages. If you have any other wishes, things you want to do or questions, please let us know and we will try our best to work it out! Our access road: The last 900 metres through the village are on an unpaved road, which means the road is covered with gravel and small stones. For cars, this is no problem, we drive here every day. Small campers and caravans also can reach our campsite, although we advise you to slow down your speed to a minimum. After all, it are only 900 metres. Unfortunately, the road is not suited for caravans. Campers up untill 6 metres in lenght can reach our place.

name: Lemon tree
description:
Hello, we are a guest house also active on other platforms and we also have two big grounds that can accommodate campers, caravans or other travelers vehicles.
We are located away from the main roads, in the middle of lemon trees and nature is always present, rabbits, pheasants and other animals living in freedom are visible almost all year long.

name: Come home to yourself in Hierland
description:
Nearby the forests (Reichswald) you can find Hierland. A tranquil garden in the rolling landscape between Nijmegen and Kleve. The place is suitable for vegan's and vegetarians. You cThere is a special bathroom for guests in the house.

Additional you can book a yoga lesson or use the tipi for your own practice. Get in touch for the possibilities. We also offer other events related to mindfulness and we have a network of other providers such as nature guides.

name: Campsite in Nouvelle-Aquitaine with a view of the vineyards
description: Treat yourself to an outdoor getaway in our campsite located in the heart of the vineyards of Nouvelle-Aquitaine. Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the vineyards at sunrise and sunset on a night or long weekend. We are delighted to welcome you and offer you a visit to our vineyard with a tasting of our local wines. Book now for an unforgettable nature holiday experience in our little corner of paradise!

name: Camping in Hooghalen
description:
Come camp with us and enjoy peace, space and nature. Our nature campsite has spacious pitches between fruit trees and berry bushes with a view over the countryside. In the immediate vicinity are several nature reserves where you can enjoy cycling and walking.
The farm has comfortable and clean sanitary facilities, heated in early and late season. We sell apple juice from apples from our own orchard, organic fair trade coffee and tea, beer, wine and ice cream.
Nearby are the heath areas Hijkerveld and Witterveld, the Fochteloërveen with the cranes, the bird hide in Diependal and forestry Hooghalen. You can swim in the nearby Baggelhuizerplas.
The Fochterloërveen is also within cycling distance, where cranes are present again and where the short-toed eagle has been spotted. The woods of the Hooghalen forestry are vast and quiet. Spruce and larch define the face. There are also beautiful heathlands and fens.
You will also find the former Westerbork camp and Radio Observatory Astron in Hooghalen.
Assen is only 8 kilometers away. A visit to the Drents Museum is always worthwhile.
The famous TT circuit is located between Assen and our campsite.
The prison museum in Veenhuizen is also a nice trip for everyone.
Our campsite is car-free. On arrival and departure, the car is allowed to go to the camping pitch.
We also rent hikers' cabins and a furnished tipi.

name: Peace, distant views and a starry sky in the southern Eifel
description:
On the grounds around our original Eifler farm, there are various locations on meadows, acres and orchards to enjoy the distant view, sunset and starry sky around a campfire.


Activities while camping in the Eifel

Hiking, cycling, picking mushrooms, observing nature or just relaxing are the activities preferred by our guests. Excursions to neighboring Luxembourg (Vianden), Belgium (Clerveaux) or Eifelzoo (Lünebach) are also popular.
There are outdoor pools in Waxweiler and Neuerburg.
Sightseeing flights with motor and glider planes can also be booked on the premises of the Utscheid sailing club.

name: Nature-rich large garden in the country for a tent, hammock or a camper
description:
In the garden, there is plenty of opportunity to find a private spot for your tent where you can use the fire pit, be in nature and relax or take a walk in the nearby forest.

Our plot is located 9 km outside historic Ribe, where you can easily spend a few days in the cozy old streets and good sights.

There is no shower, but you will be given a camping toilet on arrival, which you can take with you to your tent. from 1 June there will be a permanent toilet on the property for camping guests.

name: Aux Martis - Relaxing stay surrounded by nature in our holiday resort
description:
Welcome to our peaceful and family-friendly mini-campsite nestled in the heart of nature, offering calm, relaxation and activities for the whole family. Take advantage of our swimming pool, playground and modern sanitary facilities for a comfortable outdoor stay, while being surrounded by forest, meadows and valleys.

Enchanting and ecological setting:

Located in the heart of nature, our eco-responsible campsite offers a serene atmosphere with the chirping of birds and the neighbours' cows as background music. The terrain is made up of forest, open meadows adorned with orchids, shaded pitches and a central swimming pool near the sanitary facilities.

Varied and comfortable pitches:

Our campsite offers dedicated pitches for tents, caravans and motorhomes. The pitches offer a breathtaking view of the valley and the village of Monflanquin on the horizon, ideal for a relaxing holiday.

Modern and accessible sanitary facilities:

We provide you with 2 toilets, 2 showers and 2 sinks, as well as a toilet and a shower adapted for the disabled. Hot water is provided by an eco-responsible boiler. An outdoor shower is also available by the pool.

Facilities and services :

We provide electricity for the tents via an extension cable, as well as water and electricity for the caravan and motorhome pitches. A central point with wifi is available on site, but note that there are no cooking facilities.

Activities and discoveries for young and old:

On site, enjoy the swimming pool, playgrounds for children, hiking trails that cross our domain and cycling circuits. The area also offers excellent opportunities for cycling with many marked routes. We are located about 10 km from Monflanquin, Villeréal and Monpazier, classified among the "most beautiful villages in France", and close to the castles of Biron and Gavaudun, witnesses of the local historical heritage.

name: Camping at our mini campsite among the horses on the edge of the Eendenkooi nature reserve
description:
Mini campsite with 15 camping pitches. Motorhome camping, tents, caravans. Caravan for rent and B&B rooms

Pony riding for children up to 12 years. At 3 nights pony rides if you help to take care of the horses.

Ride tough like a cowboy with a western saddle
