Various courses with our ponies and horses, such as horse whispering and horse coaching, meditation, reiki, healing for adults.

Camping among our horses and ponies. Coaching conversations.
Beautiful walking and cycling routes through the Betuwe and the river area.

Many attractions in the area.
Like ;
The Duck Decoy Nature Reserve in Waardenburg
Tennis court Waardenburg
Estate Marienweerdt
Neerijnen Castle
Canoeing on the Linge
Go-kart track Zaltbommel
Swimming pool Geldermalsen
Swimming pool Zaltbommel

And of course much more.

Prices camping;
€18.50 for 1 person
with 1 car, caravan or camper, motorcycle or tent, 2 cyclists with tent, including 16 ampere electricity, environmental tax, VAT, including
tourist tax € 1.50 per night per person

B&B rooms 1 person €105,- including breakfast
2 persons€115,- including breakfast

name: Peaceful stay and biodiversity in Petite Camargue Gardoise
description:
Discover Les Délices du Scamandre, an ideal place for motorhome owners wishing to stay in the heart of the Petite Camargue Gardoise. Take advantage of our motorhome pitches in the Camargue available all year round for one night or several days. Contact us before your arrival to reserve your place.

Depending on the season, we offer suitable pitches for your motorhome, among horses, meadows, crops and alfalfa. Observe the local wildlife, such as storks, hares, rabbits, nutria, ducks, egrets and more, and fully enjoy the Camargue nature.

Explore our 52 hectares of land on foot or by bike, on grassy paths that wind around the property, in complete safety for you, your children, grandchildren and dogs. Remember to bring mosquito repellent and mosquito nets in summer for a carefree stay in Petite Camargue.

At Les Délices du Scamandre, we welcome motorhomes of all sizes, individually or in groups, to our Camargue motorhome area. We also offer discovery days, meals with friends, farm visits and on-site or take-out catering services.

Find our shop Les Délices du Scamandre, open 7 days a week, and remember to bring your coolers and baskets to preserve the cold chain and protect the environment.

To book, obtain information, discover our territory and our offers, visit our Lesdelicesduscamandre website and geolocate us on Google Maps.

We look forward to meeting you and sharing our passion for the Petite Camargue Gardoise with you. See you soon, Anne Marie, Fanny and Olivier Riboulet.

name: Feet on the ground, nose in the hedges, head in the stars!
description:
Come and pitch your tent, van, caravan or motorhome on a 5000m² site, 20 kilometers north of Le Mans, in an atmosphere of environmental respect. You will discover the charm and calm of the Sarthe countryside, letting yourself be lulled by the song of birds and the croaking of frogs!!

The framework

1 kilometer from the center of Ballon St Mars, in the countryside with a very quiet road bordering the land, without vis-à-vis.
Country hedges surround the entire plot.
You will have the opportunity to observe and hear a multitude of birds (robin, titmouse, magpie, blackbird, woodpecker, great spotted woodpecker, turtle dove, jay, nightingale...)
On a very sunny ground, you will have the possibility in case of rain to take refuge in a small unequipped chalet or in a larger room where the toilets and the shower are located.
Possibility to put a car in a closed garage.

The slots

Free space.
The terrain is flat and not rocky.
Asphalt path in the field.

The toilets

Toilets (sanibroyeur)
Shower

Equipment

Barbecue
No wifi, to disconnect during your stay. 4G accessible.
If necessary, wifi available at the inhabitant.

Activities

Fishing possible with compulsory fishing license in the river "l'Orne saonoise" located about 1 kilometer away.
Visit of the keep dating from the 11th century and its gardens. (paying visit by the owner)
Signposted horse trails at the end of the road.
signposted hiking and mountain biking.

Other remarks

In the village, there is a medical center, a pharmacy, a veterinarian, a small supermarket (carrefour market), a bank with cash dispensers, a tobacco bar, a tobacconist , a motorhome area with emptying, a bakery and a tattoo artist!
3 kilometers from Montbizot station, on the Tours-Le Mans-Alençon-Caen line.
Possibility of transfer according to my availability to/from Montbizot and to/from Le Mans.

name: Quiet camping with the horses in the middle of nature
description:
At the back of our very large garden there is enough space to spend the night while enjoying the peace and nature. You sleep next to the horses in the middle of the green. This is the ideal place to completely withdraw and come to yourself or to enjoy each other in peace. The horses will keep you company.
The view of the animals gives you the chance to observe them closely and enjoy the movements within the herd. These animals are so authentic and pure. This teaches you to enjoy the little things in life. Having a nice chat around the campfire about the experiences of the day, about what the horses had to tell us, makes you realize how much these animals can still teach us.
If desired, you are responsible for their care.
The horses are also used during coaching sessions where they give you more insight into who you are. They show you what you need at this moment in your life to break through certain patterns and make the right choices. They can also reveal dynamics within a family or group.


You can also experience beautiful walks and bike rides in the beautiful Hageland. If you cross the street, you walk straight into the Demer Valley to get lost in the beautiful nature for hours.
We live on the mountain bike trail. So you leave directly on the gravel into the Demerbroeken. My husband has everything you need to tinker with your bike: Bike Wash, compressor, and knowledge of bicycle mechanics. Your bike is safe and dry here under the shed or in the garage.

Other fun activities nearby:
- Sail down the Demer (full or half day) from Aarschot or Scherpenheuvel
- Walking in the Merode (Averbode Abbey)
- Visit Horst Castle (Castle of the Red Knight)
- Multi-day hiking trails to nearby bivouac sites (Rillaar, Walenbos).
The pleasant city of Aarschot is also nearby. You can go there for cultural trips, swimming parties, delicious dinners, cinema, fun shopping, etc.

name: Farm camping - get close to nature and animals
description: You can arrive here on foot or by bicycle directly from the Ringsted Experience Trail, and cars, campers and caravans are also very welcome. At our farm you can relax, greet the animals and perhaps find some berries or herbs to pick. There is a fire pit, outdoor kitchen and plenty of opportunities for play.

name: Argyll Sea View
description: We have a choice of two quiet tent pitches and one place for a van. The views round here are stunning and swimming in the loch is recommended. This is a great base for hiking (Arrochar Alps and Luss Hills 20 mins), mountain biking, fishing, sightseeing. We are 1 hour drive from Glasgow. There is also a Calmac passenger ferry from Gourock to Kilcreggan (1 mile away).

name: Parking space at the edge of the forest
description:
Our farm is in a secluded location at about 550 m altitude with a wonderful view of Kappelrodeck. The magnificent view extends from the Black Forest to the Vosges. Pure nature, just listen to the birds and enjoy this wonderful peace. At the edge of our courtyard, we offer you a large, level parking space for your mobile home, caravan and/or tent.
The place is right on the edge of the forest. A barbecue area is available on the pitch and may be used. From level 3 open fire is unfortunately prohibited. A simple toilet is located at the house about 50 m away. The subsoil of the course is well paved and grassy. The approach to the farm is easy to find, but sometimes quite steep. The last 500 m to the farm are then to be covered on a well-maintained forest path.

The area is very large and offers some nice spots to set up your camper or tent in consultation

name: Lilium Ranch
description:
This place is perfect for family getaways or couples trying to be alone in their own space. The best part is the 200+ acres to explore and hike. Plenty of wildlife and some livestock on the fence line.  StarLink wifi with extender with 1000 ft in every direction. Amazing star gazing at night, hammocks and chairs under trees.

There’s a vacant cabin on-site and access to water and power if needed. No one lives on the property so it’s very private.

Make some memories at this unique and family-friendly place. 

Yosemite is 40 miles away  
Mariposa 10 miles away
Oakhurst 10 miles away

Remote enough to get away from the busy city life. Only a drive away from key spots

Starbucks, Cinema, McDonald’s, Pizza, Sky diving much more. 




Plenty of other sweet spots to enjoy.

name: Farm camping in the Lüneburg Heath
description:
Agricamping on the farm:

Warm welcome. I offer you a self-sufficient and private tent and camper place with electricity on a well-kept farm in a quiet location. Perfect to relax and unwind. Fresh water and WiFi incl.
In the small regional farm shop you can buy eggs, pasta, potatoes, meat, jam and sausages within walking distance (Hof Brockmann, Weißenkamp).

The perfect starting point:

Attention active vacationers! There is a lot to discover in the area. Various tourist activities such as Heide Park Soltau, Weltvogelpark Walsrode, Serengeti Park Hodenhagen, Felto-Filzwelt, Soltau Therme, golf course, various museums can be reached within a maximum driving time of 30 minutes. The region is also ideal for cycling tours to Soltau or Riensheide. It is just 5 km to Soltau and approx. 10 km to Dorfmark.

See you soon!

name: On the pasture in the country idyll near Bremen
description:
For our pitch planning, we ask that you let us know what you will be staying in (tent, van, etc.) and the approximate size. We are currently doing visible renovation work in and on the house.

The parking space is in the garden of the Hullener Hof (Insta: hullener_hof) on a pasture on the edge of a settlement in the landscape conservation area. In addition to the typical land animals such as horses, cows, sheep and chickens, the picturesque area is also home to deer, storks, pheasants, birds of prey, hares, bats and other rare species that can be observed in nature from the pitch. Here you can unwind and forget the time with magical sunsets.

The use of the toilet, shower/bathtub, electricity and barbecue area is possible by arrangement and there is a filled drinks fridge from which you are welcome to help yourself. In order to receive these offers, we would be happy to receive a contribution towards expenses (recommendation: water, toilet and bath use: 2 euros per person per day; electricity: depending on consumption, usually 3 to 5 euros per day; drinks, etc. see the notice on site ).

Eggs, potatoes, spreads, meat and dairy products are available for self-service from neighboring farmers and the idyllic surroundings invite you to go hiking and cycling through meadows and fields along the watercourses to the Ochtum and the Weser beaches.

The local train station Heidkrug and other shops are 1.5 km away and the city center of Bremen and the popular Bremen Neustadt can be easily reached by S-Bahn in 5 minutes, by bike or car in just 9 km.

Due to its central, quiet location near Delmenhorst, the Hullener Hof is also the ideal starting point for exploring north-west Germany. In a radius of only approx. 60 km it goes from the Jade Bay near Wilhelmshaven on the North Sea coast with its picturesque landscapes of meadows and forests, heath and moorland, along the historic cities of Oldenburg, Bremen and Cloppenburg up to the Damme Mountains near Vechta and in the Wiehengebirge in the district of Osnabrück.

... and in the evening you sit by the fire in the pasture, watch the bats or look at the starry sky ...

The Hullener Hof is a small farm from the 1930s that was mainly used to supply milk. The milk was delivered daily by horse-drawn carriage and was still offered in the farm shop up until the 1970s. The cows were milked directly on the pasture where the pitch is located today.

An open place for relaxation, creativity and encounters is being created on the Hullener Hof - with nature and animals, other people, leisure and creative activities.

We wish you a pleasant stay

Tom & Ina

with Karlotta, the cats Mimi, Motte, Holly & Mr. Bean and the rabbits Merida, Molly & Miffy

name: Bookfreak's micro camping
description:
We have a rather big garden, located in a small village, between the fields and active farms. So far we don't have much experience with tents in our garden, except our own. Bathroom and toilet are inside the house, and of course to share with my family. We have a small dog, a cat, a canary-bird, chicken and my daughter has a pony.
I don't know how many people would be too many, but as we have to share one bathroom, I suppose 4 will be enough. We ourselves are already at least with 4, sometimes 5. We includes my husband Guy, our daughter Orphee and her boyfriend Kristof, and our youngest daughter Dymphi. A few years ago we 'exchanged' Dymphi to the Dominican Republic, and a boy from Turkey came to be our son. In 2017 we had an exchange student from Czech Republic. First half of 2019 we had an exchange student from Thailand, second half of 2019 we had another exchange student from Thailand. Beginning of 2020 we had, only for a short time because of corona, an exchange student from Dominican Republic.

name: Arvids Garden
description:
Beautiful piece of nature on the edge of a recreational area and located on numerous waterways. In the middle of Antwerp and Brussels, squeezed between A12 and E19, yet in an oasis of green and ideal for walking and cycling without ending up in busy traffic. No water, plumbing or electricity. Use of bathroom and toilet in the residence possible after appointments. Contact us if you want extras such as; bicycle rental, tents, electricity, courier, ... if possible it will be provided for an agreed price.
Ideal for mobile homes

Superb spot on the border of a recreation domain, near by the water. In between Antwerp and Brussels, and the two highways between them but never the less in the middle of only green. Ideal spot to walk or bike without strugling the traffic.

There is no water, sanitary or electricity provided on the spot but can be used in the house on agreement. If you want something; like bikes, tents, electricity, grossery,… please ask and we see whats possible
Ideal for campers.

name: Farmer's mini campsite, quiet location in Salland
description:
We are open from April
---
Boeren Mini Camping is located in a beautiful, quiet location in Salland with a wide view over meadows with horses and near a small retirement stable with rest house horses.
We have a fire pit for you to use!

We have a shared shelter, below you will find walking and cycling maps, games, local newspaper and brochures, cold drink from the vending machine and fresh eggs from our own chickens every day! You can also go here for small necessities such as wood, charcoal, washing powder, bbq (one-off), fly swatters, homemade (scented) candles, etc.

We also rent out a chalet, gypsy wagon, retro caravan and a stable home (off grid). Except in the stable home, bed linen and kitchen towels are provided, bring your own (bath) towels!

The stable home is unique and is separate from the campsite at the back of our site! It can only be reached via a footpath along the horses. It is furnished with 2 beds and mattresses, solar lamps, fire pit with grill and Dutch oven, cutlery and tools, plates, cups, lighters and wood. There is a gas burner for a quick cup of coffee or a soup, also nice in rainy weather! Next to the house is a (dry) toilet and there is a zinc bathtub under which a fire can be lit! Water for the bath can be taken from the pump. (during the winter period there is no water at the house and therefore no bath possible)
Drinking water can be obtained in the sanitary building at the campsite, you can also use our sanitary facilities, but for a real off-grid experience you can save yourself at the cottage! Possibly there is room for an extra tent, the cottage itself is for 2 people.

You can rent bed linen (for stable home) from us, we also have towel packages (2 (bath) towels, 2 washcloths, bottle of shampoo and shower gel)

Landgoed De Oostermaat is nearby, in the beautiful, quiet and rural Okkenbroek.

There are many walking and cycling paths around our place, where you can enjoy nature, such as the marskramerpad and the pieterpad.

Deventer Koekstad (located on the IJssel) is eight kilometers away from our place with its historic city center, rich in beautiful historic buildings that you can also admire during a city walk. Sallandse Heuvelrug National Park is 6.5 kilometers away, where you can enjoy the beautiful landscape.

name: Association of Friends of Mallorca
description: Family pitches with electricity, water, toilet, shower, WiFi. About 3 km to Can Picafort with all shopping facilities and the 11 km long sandy beach.

name: Sheep inn de geul
description:
Peace, fun, view and nature
Then come to our sheep hill,
Here you sleep between the sheep in a beautiful and unique location
book our jacuzzi and enjoy the peace and the view.

name: Camping with a view of the fields, sheep & chickens. #Mongoose
description:
Beautiful view of the rolling landscape.
Close to sheep, chickens, dogs and cats.
Camping in a fenced, closed meadow, near the apple tree..


Close to popular cycling routes (green 62 / nodes) - 16 km from Bruges / 20 km from Ostend.

We have 2 dogs ourselves: Ella 🐶 and Myla, 8 cats 🦁, sheep and (fresh eggs from our) +30 chickens 🐔.

Come and play a game of kubb, frisbee, batminthon, petanque...
Peace, love & happiness ✌🏻 Our motto: free & happy! Good vibes only ☮️✌🏻🕊 Relax with us, live on the rhythm of nature and the seasons!


Our only rules: respect each other and each other's belongings! Be free and happy :)


In the weekend, a spontaneous jam session / sing-along moment is organized around the campfire.

Tip: very nice cycling in the area.

Insta: #CampMongoose

mongoose? west flemish: Man' goste - we were looking forward to it - this is a hobby :)
the idea originated as a joke with friends at the campfire 🔥 See you soon?


And if you're still in doubt, I do a happy dance with every booking 😃🤞🏻🍀🙏🏻
#grateful

name: Idyllic camping in Hohenlohe-Franconia
description:
Nature, idyll and time out:

Our little town of Windisch-Bockenfeld is in the midst of the idyll of Hohenlohe-Franconia. With just under 30 residents, you can enjoy 100% peace, country air and a love of life here. There is plenty of space on our property for a caravan/camper van/van or for a simple tent. Look forward to a home in the middle of nature. I promise you a hidden and idyllic pitch with a fabulous view. Infinite expanse and sunset romance in the evening!

To experience in the region:

For the adventurous, the enchanting old town of Rothenburg ob der Tauber is only 10 minutes away by car. Everyone really gets their money's worth here, whether families, couples, solo travelers or friends. Extensive hiking trails, bike tours and canoe adventures make the adventure heart beat faster.

Welcome!

name: Relaxation
description: calm and view

name: Camping à Le Clos Castel, site paisible à la campagne proche des sites du Débarquement
description: Découvrez Le Clos Castel, un véritable havre de paix situé en plein cœur de la campagne normande pour des vacances à la campagne proche des sites du Débarquement. Cette ferme en pierre imposante s'étend sur plus de 2 hectares et propose un camping à la ferme comprenant 6 emplacements pour un séjour tranquille en pleine nature. Vous êtes à la recherche d'un séjour paisible pour découvrir la nature et l'histoire de Normandie ? Ne cherchez plus ! Le Clos Castel, une entreprise familiale dirigée par un couple britannique et vétéran de l'armée britannique depuis 29 ans, est l'endroit idéal pour vous ressourcer. Avec un accès facile aux plages du Débarquement et au parc régional des Marais de Contentin, vous pourrez explorer la région à votre guise. Réservez dès maintenant votre camping en Normandie pour un séjour de détente et de découvertes.

name: Spacious meadow with campfire place
description:
We have a beautiful meadow with an unobstructed view of the church tower of Sevenum and the horse pasture of the neighbors.

It is a 20-minute walk to the center for local restaurants, 700 meters to the supermarket for groceries or delicious fresh sandwiches and 600 meters to the Horst-Sevenum station for a day in Venlo or Eindhoven.
Furthermore, there is a wide possibility of trips to attractions in the area such as the theme park Toverland and Peelbergen Equestrian Centre.

There are also many options here for hikers, cyclists and horse lovers. If you have your own horse and would like to take it with you, it is possible to arrange a place in the stable or pasture in consultation with the neighbors.

So be surprised and book a weekend away in Sevenum!
But also great for a single night if you are passing through. We are a short distance from the A67 and A73.

name: Hesehof Nature as far as the eye can see
description:
Hello dear campers!

We offer you a parking space for self-sufficient caravans and mobile homes on our farm. Supply and disposal is possible. You can stay with us for one night or several nights. Our property is located in 27432 Bremervörde OT HESEDORF (Rotenburg/Wümme district) on the outskirts. This is in the ♥️ of the Elbe-Weser triangle (between Hamburg and Bremen) There are very nice hiking trails here (the north trails). Our area is also suitable for cycling. There are very nice circular tours along the Oste through forests and meadows. Also worth mentioning are very nice cafes, country inns and Melkhus

Our range:
Spacious pitches with a view of nature. There is also a campfire site, wood can be purchased from us.
Unfortunately, we cannot yet offer waste disposal, showers and toilets. For groups we offer a cabin with fridge/freezer seating etc.
We don't do it to make money, we do it to give campers a place to relax. We are campers ourselves and look forward to friendly and nice like-minded people

name: Vechtdal Overijssel A natural, green, hospitable and special environment
description:
Our place is located in the Vechtdal, near Ommen, Dalfsen, Hardenberg, and Zwolle. There is plenty to do in the beautiful Vechtdal. You can enjoy walking, cycling, canoeing, boating, and swimming. There are also several interesting and fun museums and shopping near the campsite. Looking for a nice restaurant? Or do you want to get an ice cream with the children? Everything is possible.

Our place is located in the Vechtdal, near Ommen, Dalfsen, Hardenberg and Zwolle. There is plenty to experience in the beautiful Vechtdal. You can enjoy walking, cycling, canoeing, boating and swimming. There are also several interesting and fun museums and beautiful accessible nature reserves near the farm campsite. Looking for a nice restaurant? Or would you like to get an ice cream with the children? Everything is possible.

name: Camping in the floodplains of the Maas, in the middle of nature.
description:
Our Campspace is for nature lovers. There is room for tents at the campsite. On the camping site you will experience nature as it should be. So no animation program and disco etc but spacious pitches and good sanitary facilities.
For more options, visit the Maasakker website.

name: At Achelse Vault
description: Meadow against the vast forests of the Warmbeek valley around Trappist monastery. TIP: a historical tour in the Trappist monastery with a tasting at the end (blond and brown!)

name: Nature meets luxury - camping with a view and tranquillity
description:
Fancy an adventure in an oasis of peace with an exclusive location?
There are 2 parking spaces, which are spatially separated from each other and are each occupied by only one vehicle. This guarantees you a lot of privacy and tranquility.

Pitch 1 in the courtyard with electricity, fresh water and WiFi included

Pitch 2 on a hill (about 250m from the farm)

Both places allow a great panoramic view of the Bavarian Forest.

Here you will find space and time just for you in the middle of the nature of the Bavarian Forest.

The perfect place to relax - sunrise included. Space and privacy, directly surrounded by meadows and forests, at the end of a 38-inhabitant village (no through road).

high up? Summiteer?

Exactly what you make of your stay here is entirely up to you. Do you like being active? The Bavarian Forest with Germany's first national park is a paradise for hikers and mountain bikers. Check off your summit list: Großer Arber (1456m), Großer Rachel (1453m), Lusen (1373m) - with breathtaking views and unique, untouched nature. In summer there are numerous bathing lakes nearby to soak up the sun. Are you in relaxation mode: chill in or on the camper

Insider tips from host Christian:

Great hikes directly from the pitch: to the Wackelstein or to the deserted, mystical mountain village of Heimbrechtsreuth. The must-sees of the mountains: Großer Falkenstein, Großer Rachel and Brotjacklriegel. The excellent home-style Bavarian cuisine (please reserve by phone): Kammbräu Zenting, Re(h)serviert Frauenau. The old town walk including Ortsspitz and Feste Oberhaus in Passau. In summer: swimming in the Ebenreuther See (3 minutes by car from the mountain spot). MTB route of the Trans-Bayerwald: Spiegelau - Zwieslerwaldhaus (with the forest railway back to Spiegelau)

name: Motorhome Park Go
description:
Space is parking place intended to park the motorhome, campervan, caravan for one all day or for a few days. Also to park the motorhome, campervan, caravan for one month or for a few months.

Parking place is easily accessible, safe and affordable just for a couple or for a whole family with kids.

Nearby attractions: Solkan Bridge (Solkanski most). River Soča. Soča Valley. Kayak center Solkan. Holy Mountain (Sveta Gora). Holy Mountain Basilica (Svetogorska bazilika). Hill Sabotin (Sabotin). Europe Square (Trg Evrope). Vila Bartolomei.

Activities: Road bike tracks. Hikes. Climbing. Kayak, canoe is possible on the river Soča. Swimming is possible in the river Soča. Fishing is possible in the river Soča. Rafting is possible on the river Soča. Descent along the steel cable across the river Soča is possible. Point of view on the Soča Valley. Cycling along a beautifully arranged, asphalted cycle path from the town of Solkan to the town of Plave with a beautiful view of the river Soča which runs near the cycle path.

name: Small-scale campsite in Groningen
description:
This is a small sustainable campsite for anyone who really wants to feel free on holiday. We invite you to relax and enjoy the beautiful camping grounds and the beautiful surroundings of Sellingen.
You camp on our two-hectare site, in the middle of the forests of Staatsbosbeheer and the farm landscape.

The campsite is located in Sellingen in the hamlet of Laude. Anyone who thinks of the vast Dutch landscape when thinking of Groningen is wrong. The municipality of Westerwolde lies largely on sandy soil and therefore offers a wooded landscape between the farm fields.

The Sellingerbeetse, a small lake that was created as a sand excavation, is a ten-minute bike ride away. The peaceful surroundings and the clean water immediately give you the ultimate holiday feeling.
Another place you can definitely go to on a hot day is the outdoor swimming pool in Sellingen. You imagine yourself back in the eighties with green lawns and children playing in the water. There is a paddling pool for the little ones, a slide and diving boards for the slightly older ones and the more sporty can enjoy the 25 meter pool.

The beautiful fortified village of Bourtange has a number of museums and a medieval terrace square. Bourtange is only a fifteen minute drive from the campsite.

name: La Fosior Camping, Near Salina Turda
description:
Camping la foisor is situated in Turda, 3.5 km from salina turda. The camping offers a big space for caravans and tents.
There is a swimming pool (during the summer), clean toilets and showers, a wooden pavillion where you can cook your meals, a fridge, a small playground for your kids, trampoline. You also have the option to bring a barbeque grill to your caravan/tent.

There is also a room for rent.
The room of 27 square meters includes: private bathroom, private terrace, small fridge, AC, television, double bed, sofa bed for two people.

Located next to the Aries River, where willing visitors can fish, the campsite offers an oasis of peace and relaxation in the middle of the city of Turda, but at the same time far from the daily hustle and bustle.

name: Camping in the Kloostertuin at the forest in Flanders.
description: Many play areas for young children, go-carts, seesaw, swings, mud kitchen, sandpit, forest, trampoline, fire circle with wood and pan, bbq grill. toilet electricity, cold water shower. hot shower possible for 2€. cooking facilities, gas stove, pans, kitchen utensils, dishes, kettle, refrigerator, tables with chairs, In the middle of the walking nodes located next to node 90. Many short walking routes within a short distance. Located on the N14 between the villages of Minderhout and Meerle, 2 km. from the Dutch border. Our rooster will wake you up in the morning. Next to our Campspace is an Alpaca farm where you can experience different adventures with their Alpacas. Be sure to check out their website Alpaca's Hoogstraten.

name: Camping in Hooghalen
description:
Come camp with us and enjoy peace, space and nature. Our nature campsite has spacious pitches between fruit trees and berry bushes with a view over the countryside. In the immediate vicinity are several nature reserves where you can enjoy cycling and walking.
The farm has comfortable and clean sanitary facilities, heated in early and late season. We sell apple juice from apples from our own orchard, organic fair trade coffee and tea, beer, wine and ice cream.
Nearby are the heath areas Hijkerveld and Witterveld, the Fochteloërveen with the cranes, the bird hide in Diependal and forestry Hooghalen. You can swim in the nearby Baggelhuizerplas.
The Fochterloërveen is also within cycling distance, where cranes are present again and where the short-toed eagle has been spotted. The woods of the Hooghalen forestry are vast and quiet. Spruce and larch define the face. There are also beautiful heathlands and fens.
You will also find the former Westerbork camp and Radio Observatory Astron in Hooghalen.
Assen is only 8 kilometers away. A visit to the Drents Museum is always worthwhile.
The famous TT circuit is located between Assen and our campsite.
The prison museum in Veenhuizen is also a nice trip for everyone.
Our campsite is car-free. On arrival and departure, the car is allowed to go to the camping pitch.
We also rent hikers' cabins and a furnished tipi.

name: Come and relax to the sound of cicadas and the scent of lavender
description: Come and discover our family campsite in Auvergne, peaceful and located in the medieval village of Vesc, a stone's throw from Dieulefit, in the heart of the Drôme Provençale regional natural park. Enjoy nature holidays in Auvergne in a dream setting, surrounded by lush and unspoiled nature, ideal for hiking lovers. Our Auvergne campsite overlooks a magnificent valley, offering a breathtaking view. We invite you to pitch your tent or set up your caravan on our spacious and shaded pitches, or to rent one of our comfortable accommodations for family holidays. On site, you will find all the necessary amenities for a successful stay: a heated swimming pool to relax after a day of hiking, a snack bar for snacks, activities for children and much more. Book now and treat yourself to an unforgettable holiday in Auvergne!

name: La Ferme Naturiste: Ecological and naturist campsite in the heart of nature
description: Treat yourself to a stay in a naturist campsite in the heart of New Aquitaine at La Ferme Naturiste. Nestled in an enchanting setting, this ecological and environmentally friendly vacation spot invites you to camp under the stars and discover the organic farm. Relax in the natural swimming pool while enjoying an authentic and friendly experience with other travelers. You can also explore the region rich in heritage and cultural and sporting activities. Book now for a unique vacation combining nature, ecology and well-being.

name: Nice camping spot and glamping tents on a small-scale campsite in the Achterhoek
description:
At our small-scale campsite you can still enjoy the chirping of the birds, the space and nature. A wonderful base to discover the Achterhoek. Explore the area during the day, or spend a day at the campsite. After which you can enjoy the evening under the starry sky by the campfire. That's possible with us!
The camping site has spacious pitches of at least 125 m2. All our camping pitches are suitable for camper, tent or caravan and equipped with drainage, electricity (6 amps) and water.
There is plenty to do for the children, such as the sandbox, animal meadow, water playground and various go-karts, bicycles and pedal tractors.
Dogs are allowed in consultation, provided they are on a leash. We charge a small fee for this. We would appreciate it if you let us know in advance.

name: CAMPSITE of the Northern Vosges Natural Park
description: Treat your family to a relaxing stay on the edge of the Vosges du Nord natural park massif, in the heart of the Pays de Hanau - cradle of the pretzel. Our campsite welcomes you for a stay in the mountains, between forests and magnificent landscapes. Come and discover the wealth of fauna and flora, enjoy outdoor activities, fishing, cycling and hiking. We offer pitches for motorhomes, caravans and tents. Book now for an unforgettable experience in a peaceful and rejuvenating setting.

name: Sloping meadow
description:
Pure nature between Crailsheim and Bad Mergentheim in the pristine Ette Valley.
18000 square meters of land with brook, slope, large meadow, huge old walnut tree with seating underneath, partially fenced property for dogs.
Bad Mergentheim wildlife park, Rothenburg ob der Tauber, valleys such as Jaggsttal, Kochertal and various smaller ones nearby.
Chickens, cats and dog brownies are already on the farm.
More animals are to follow.

name: Idyllic camper place near Berlin
description:
RV park in the countryside

Our parking space is behind the house on a beautiful meadow. Sometimes there are horses in the immediate vicinity, sometimes you can also hear a tractor :-) Everything here invites you to relax. If you like it more sporty, you can do archery. There is a straw disc, you have to bring your own bows. Parking space only for a self-sufficient vehicle up to max. 3.5t with max. vehicle length 7 m and max. vehicle width 2.30 m.

Interesting facts about the area

Our local supermarket is about 200 m away on foot and the bus stop to Potsdam/Berlin is about 200 m away. With public transport you are in Potsdam in about 20 minutes and in Berlin in 45 minutes. A bathing lake 4 km away provides cooling off in summer. Our parking space is also ideal for transit, since the Michendorf motorway exit is not far away. The area speaks for itself, there really is something for everyone

Welcome!

name: Peaceful campsite in Brittany | 300m from the beach | Bay of Douarnenez
description:
Peaceful family campsite 300m from the beach in the Bay of Douarnenez | Discover wild Brittany from our ideal location

Come and discover our charming family campsite, located in the heart of the Bay of Douarnenez, just 300 meters from the beach. A true haven of peace for lovers of traditional camping, where tents, vans, caravans and hikers are welcome. Immerse yourself in the wild and unspoiled nature of Brittany, and enjoy an authentic setting for your holidays.

Our campsite, the perfect starting point for exploring the natural treasures of the region, benefits from a central position in the bay, with many sites within an hour's drive. Take the famous GR 34 path which goes around Brittany, and which passes right next to our establishment.

In addition to the nearby beach, our campsite offers an on-site snack bar for your convenience, as well as Stand Up Paddle and Surf rentals for your entertainment. Book your stay in our little Breton paradise now, and enjoy a unique experience at our family campsite in Brittany!

name: Winery
description:
Come relax and enjoy nature in a rural setting and winery

I am available every day but it is highly desirable to book 24 hours a day.

name: Camp Sokol Troja
description: Prague CZ

name: Fantastic location with sheep, stream and fire pit
description:
The parking space is in the immediate vicinity of the northern city limits of Berlin in Mühlenbecker Land with an S-Bahn connection, a 10-minute walk. Nature reserves for hiking and cycling in the immediate vicinity. The Berlin city center is about 30 minutes away.

The area offers many beautiful destinations nearby. You can rent e-bikes or SUP boards from us for a small price. There is a playground for children within a 2-minute walk and various horse farms in the immediate vicinity. A bike ride is also possible directly from the pitch on bike paths.

On the property itself there are sheep, a small stream and a very cozy fireplace.

We look forward to your visit.

name: Parking space with a view of the forest and asparagus field
description: Campsite in absolute peace, center of beautiful tourist sights/cities, Danube cycle path,

name: Open-air campsite in Pamproux: The calm of nature halfway between Poitiers and Niort
description: Located on a cereal farm, our pitches with the operator in Pamproux offer a peaceful camping experience in a wooded park of 3000m2. Just 5 km from the town of Pamproux and halfway between Poitiers and Niort, our pitches are easily accessible from the A10/A83 exit, just 6 km away. If you are looking for a break on your journey between Poitiers and Niort, our outdoor campsite is the ideal place to relax and enjoy a night under the stars. In addition, our location is close to several area attractions, such as La Rochelle beach just 100 km away, Futuroscope amusement park 50 km away, and Puy du Fou theme park 70 km away. After a busy day, you can cool off in our swimming pool available in summer. Book now for a one-of-a-kind camping experience in Nouvelle-Aquitaine!

name: Quiet campsite
description:
Treat yourself to a rejuvenating and ecological holiday on the banks of the La Beaume river, in our eco-responsible campsite located in the south of the Ardèche. At the heart of a verdant wine estate and surrounded by the majestic crests of the Tanargue and the limestone plateau, our campsite in Pays Beaume Drobie is an ideal destination for nature lovers.

Take advantage of authenticity and respect for the environment in a preserved setting, close to organic market gardening. Only 25 km from the Grotte Chauvet 2 and the Gorges de l'Ardèche, our campsite is the ideal starting point to discover the wonders of the region.

Join us for holidays in harmony with nature and the values of the land, in an eco-responsible campsite committed to sustainable tourism in Ardèche. Please note that a tourist tax of €0.22 per person aged 18 and over, per night, is to be paid on site (not included in the price of the night).

name: Quiet land in the Ardennes, with a view of the village.
description: Quiet, sun-exposed land with shaded location, easy access for any vehicle. Drinking water 100 meters from the owner. Brazier and wood available on site. Barbeque available. Self-contained location. No toilet or shower.

name: Village of the port, Edge of the Dordogne river Relaxation
description:
On the banks of the Dordogne, come and relax at the camping village du port!
Choose one of our many spacious and shaded pitches or in one of our perfectly equipped gîtes/lodges with a view of the river in the heart of generous nature.
Fitted out for your holidays, swimming pools, paddling pool, mini tennis and jacuzzi will delight the whole family.
We also welcome groups of cyclists, hikers... with the possibility of having a meal service by reservation.

The Dordogne is one of the most beautiful destinations in France for autumn! From the campsite you access by a path to the small town of st sozy where you will find grocery bakery press without forgetting the Bruno the butcher, but also restaurants the post office the tobacco and a most authentic atmosphere... You are also 30 minutes away drive from incredible sites such as Rocamadour or the Gouffre de Padirac.
Unusual holidays in a preserved environment!

name: Malouinniere Campagnarde: experience nature in the heart of Brittany
description: Discover La Malouinniere, a peaceful campsite in Brittany located between the tourist gems of Mont Saint-Michel and Saint-Malo. Enjoy a relaxing getaway surrounded by nature and escape the stress of everyday life. Book now your stay in our charming country house, located near the Breton beaches and the region's must-see tourist sites. Entertainment for children and stays in a motorhome or caravan are also available for an unforgettable holiday experience in Brittany.

name: Lakeside Bliss: Dive into Relaxation at our Camp Oasis
description:
Welcome to Garden Camping Shkoder, a hidden gem nestled in the heart of nature. Our camp space offers a truly enchanting experience for outdoor enthusiasts seeking tranquility and adventure.
Immerse yourself in the towering trees which provide a natural canopy that filters sunlight and creates a soothing ambiance. Explore the landscapes near our camping grounds and find your highest self, emerging in this beautiful experience.
At Garden Camping Shkoder, we prioritize relaxation and connection with nature. Pitch your tent or park your RV on our spacious and secluded campsites, each thoughtfully designed to ensure privacy and comfort. Fall asleep to the gentle lullaby of chirping birds and wake up to the crisp scent of pine in the air.
Unwind by our sparkling lake, where you can fish, swim, or simply bask in the sun on the beach. For the adventurous souls, we can offer canoeing and kayaking opportunities to explore the calm waters and discover hidden coves.
Build your own campfire and enjoy as the night sky unfolds its splendor above. Share stories and laughter with fellow campers, forging bonds that will last a lifetime. Our camp space also features picnic areas and a communal gathering space, perfect for group activities and outdoor meals.
Escape the hustle and bustle of daily life and reconnect with the wonders of nature at Garden Camping Shkoder. Whether you seek solitude, family fun, or thrilling outdoor pursuits, our camp space is your gateway to a rejuvenating and unforgettable experience. Book your stay today and let the whispers of the pines guide you to blissful serenity.

name: Campsite near the Pagnevaart forest
description:
The campsite is located in the outskirts of Oudenbosch near the Pagnevaartbos. This is a nature and recreation area between Hoeven and Bosschenhoofd and is within walking distance of our campsite.
The village center of Oudenbosch and the station are 2 kilometers away. Cafés, restaurants, but also supermarkets are located in a circle of 1 to 2 kilometers.
Our campsite is easily accessible from the A58, Breda - Roosendaal, and from the A 17 Dordrecht - Roosendaal.
The distance is 10 kilometers from Roosendaal, 20 kilometers from Breda and 60 kilometers from Antwerp. But the Zeeland coast is also easily accessible, Burgh Haamstede is only 75 kilometers from the campsite.
Ideal for planning a day trip to the city, water park or the beach.

name: Camping: Back to the authentic
description: Stay at Domaine de La Paille, a unique and eco-responsible nature campsite, nestled between the Lot and Dordogne valleys. Immerse yourself in a return to authenticity by exploring the local fauna and flora in a preserved setting. Enjoy unusual accommodation and unforgettable outdoor holidays with family or friends.

name: Campsite Weißenthalsmühle in northern Hesse
description:
Relax in the middle of the forest:

We are a beautiful small campsite with electricity and water connection in the Grimm home of northern Hesse, located in a small forest directly on the Ems. There are pitches for tourist and long-term campers, as well as two pretty little tiny houses for overnight stays. Sanitary facilities with warm showers, warm water and toilets provide the necessary comfort. We also run a small kiosk with a beer garden.

To discover in the area:

Our campsite has a direct connection to the hiking and biking trails in the Habichtswald Nature Park. Hike, for example, around the fish ponds - Engels Ruh round from Niedenstein or enjoy the view from the Bilstein - basalt formation on the Bensberg round from Niedenstein.

Welcome!

name: Nature campsite in the heart of Limousin, a few minutes from Santiago de Compostela
description: Stay in our nature campsite in the heart of Limousin, offering breathtaking views of the surrounding countryside. At the exit of a charming hamlet, our land has a gravelled area for parking motorhomes and a meadow area for small vans. Enjoy the calm of our vacation resort on an outdoor vacation, accompanied by the gentle sound of a stream flowing below. Our land is bordered by large oak trees and a beautiful lime tree which provide shade for a quiet stay. Located a few minutes from one of the roads to Saint Jacques de Compostela, our location will allow you to take full advantage of the region. Just 15 minutes from La Souterraine, our nature campsite is ideal for nature lovers and pilgrims to Santiago de Compostela. We have chosen to limit the reception to two vehicles at a time in order to guarantee a peaceful stay for our visitors. You will also have access to a city water tap for your convenience. Book your stay in our meadow now.

name: Camping Flintstones Park
description:
Totally surrounded by greenery, tranquillity is the norm in this corner of paradise and the entertainments are simple and ecological. 300 metres from the beautiful beach of Bruca, an expanse of fine sand located in the heart of the Hyblaean coast of Ragusa.

A quiet environment, in close contact with nature. The natural pool made of stone and the numerous barbeques located inside the structure are our strengths. Come and visit us to better enjoy your holiday, in total relaxation.

name: Nice outside
description:
There is a farm somewhere in the Gelderse Vallei. Opposite that farm is a small forest. A meadow in that forest. A campfire on the meadow. There are 2 chairs at the campfire. YOU are sitting on that one chair! What's in that other chair? your book? Or is there someone? Or is there your glass of wine or a beer? You can say it. You can be there. Because YOU are invited to our grove. Few facilities (1 shower and 1 toilet), lots of space (over 1 hectare of forest and grass).

What's up for you?
The whole meadow, the forest, the tiny cave, everything is there for you.
For you alone, or for you and your family, or for you with a small group (max 5 people).
You bring your own caravan, tent or camper.
You're welcome!

What does it cost?
Price: € 275,- euro for the whole weekend. € 375,- for a midweek. Deposit: € 100,-

Fresh milk and eggs for sale on the farm. Various recipes with that milk and/or eggs hang in the tiny cave.
Beef and chicken also for sale on the farm. Plus recipes for cooking it in a witch's cauldron on the campfire
Fresh vegetables for sale within cycling distance.
Go wild with a wild-picking soup? This also includes a recipe with an explanation of the wild-picking ingredients.

name: Wonderful camping spot in the middle of the Achterhoek nature!
description:
We live in beautiful Toldijk located in the municipality of Bronckhorst.
You can camp with us in the bongerd (fruit orchard) where you have a nice and quiet and secluded spot. Here you can enjoy the tranquility, the wild animals or just go out and about.

You can relax here and discover the area by experiencing one of the many cycling or walking routes.

Or rent one of our inflatable supboards to discover the area on the water! (Book in advance! Op=Op)

In our farm shop we have a wide range of delicious local products such as juices and drinks, salads, potatoes, vegetables and fruit, meat and dairy and so on.
It is also possible to order freshly baked Achterhoek spelled bread for the next morning.

In the vicinity are several swimming, shopping centers and supermarkets.
Toldijk is located between Doetinchem and Zutphen and is 30 minutes by car to Arnhem.

* The shower is a cold water outdoor shower so bring a swimsuit if you want to use it

*Power is NOT included in the price

*We have fire pits and wood for sale in our shop

name: Camping in Croatia's forest with only bird songs
description: Our place is called Bogata Suma, "Rich Forest". We grow nut trees on our permaculture farm, and at the forest edge we have some quiet camping spots. Privacy and silence/nature's sounds guaranteed!

name: Relaxed quay blowing between the trees
description: Our campsite is fully equipped for cyclists ... an indoor area to sit (dry), cooking facilities, refrigerator, coffee and tea making facilities, microwave, breakfast service with a wide choice, picnic tables on the field, mini library and a lovely field.

name: The Myrs Farm
description: In the middle of the vineyards with a breathtaking view of the Agly and the Del Far tower, the farm is a breeding of alpacas and miniature donkeys...

name: Hesehof Nature as far as the eye can see
description:
Hello dear campers!

We offer you a parking space for self-sufficient caravans and mobile homes on our farm. Supply and disposal is possible. You can stay with us for one night or several nights. Our property is located in 27432 Bremervörde OT HESEDORF (Rotenburg/Wümme district) on the outskirts. This is in the ♥️ of the Elbe-Weser triangle (between Hamburg and Bremen) There are very nice hiking trails here (the north trails). Our area is also suitable for cycling. There are very nice circular tours along the Oste through forests and meadows. Also worth mentioning are very nice cafes, country inns and Melkhus

Our range:
Spacious pitches with a view of nature. There is also a campfire site, wood can be purchased from us.
Unfortunately, we cannot yet offer waste disposal, showers and toilets. For groups we offer a cabin with fridge/freezer seating etc.
We don't do it to make money, we do it to give campers a place to relax. We are campers ourselves and look forward to friendly and nice like-minded people

name: Campsite in Brittany: Enjoy absolute calm on the banks of the Aulne
description: If you are looking for a peaceful and isolated place for a holiday away from tourists in Brittany, come to Argol, a commune often overlooked due to the absence of a beach in the immediate vicinity. You will be able to enjoy many hikes in the Breton nature, in particular towards the Menez Hom, the harbor of Brest or even the GR34, which will take you to the very end of the Crozon peninsula. If you're looking to get away from the stresses of city life, our tranquil location is perfect for you to completely relax and rejuvenate. However, keep in mind that 3G works well depending on weather conditions and wind direction, so don't rely too much on streaming or video conferencing to stay connected and come reconnect with nature instead!😉

name: Quiet land in the Ardennes, with a view of the village.
description: Quiet, sun-exposed land with shaded location, easy access for any vehicle. Drinking water 100 meters from the owner. Brazier and wood available on site. Barbeque available. Self-contained location. No toilet or shower.

name: Camping Bourgogne-Franche-Comté : campez en toute tranquillité sur notre terrain spacieux
description: Campez en toute tranquillité en Bourgogne-Franche-Comté sur notre terrain spacieux de 4500 m2, idéal pour les vacances en plein air. Situé à Prety, à seulement 2 km de la sortie 27 de l'A6, notre camping en Bourgogne offre un cadre idyllique entouré d'arbres, collines, pré, plaine, forêt et vignoble. Vous pourrez installer votre propre tente ou garer votre véhicule sur place pour profiter d'un séjour tranquille en pleine nature. Notre terrain spacieux vous garantit une expérience unique de camping en Bourgogne, avec un lac, une rivière, un ruisseau, une zone urbaine, un verger et une grotte à proximité. Réservez dès maintenant pour passer des vacances inoubliables en camping Bourgogne.

name: Parking space at the small thatched cottage, secluded location on the meadow
description:
Our pitch is idyllically situated on a small meadow. The unobstructed view of fields and meadows is a real highlight. If you are looking for peace, lots of nature and relaxation, then you have come to the right place!

You can reach Lüneburg and the beautiful Elbtalaue from here by bike. Both are about 30 minutes away.

New from May 2023 - if you like, you can use our new barrel sauna for a small surcharge. With a clear view of the field, you can end the day comfortably there.

name: VeTu DeBo stay between the trees, near the Blankaart
description:
Come camp in my quiet meadow between the trees, with a wide view of the fields and the sunset. Birds around you, the necessary facilities, large campfire place, regional beers in the fridge. Great base for numerous excursions - to the coast, the Blankaart nature reserve and the nearby city of Diksmuide.

On the large camping meadow you sleep between the trees, and you are accompanied by hares, rabbits and pheasants!

There is electricity for a fee (3 eu / night 2 people, from 3rd press there will be an additional EUR each time) with the help of extension cables that you can bring yourself, wood available, (not free) extra garbage bags available. You can also rent a spacious tent of 5x8 meters.
I myself have two dogs in a fenced yard.

name: Campsite near the Pagnevaart forest
description:
The campsite is located in the outskirts of Oudenbosch near the Pagnevaartbos. This is a nature and recreation area between Hoeven and Bosschenhoofd and is within walking distance of our campsite.
The village center of Oudenbosch and the station are 2 kilometers away. Cafés, restaurants, but also supermarkets are located in a circle of 1 to 2 kilometers.
Our campsite is easily accessible from the A58, Breda - Roosendaal, and from the A 17 Dordrecht - Roosendaal.
The distance is 10 kilometers from Roosendaal, 20 kilometers from Breda and 60 kilometers from Antwerp. But the Zeeland coast is also easily accessible, Burgh Haamstede is only 75 kilometers from the campsite.
Ideal for planning a day trip to the city, water park or the beach.

name: Camping on the Holschbacherhöhe on the edge of the Westerwald
description:
More than just a place around the campfire.
On the Holschbacherhöhe you will experience nature, relaxation and hospitality.
Between orchards, chickens, horses and a good portion of landscape,
we would like to invite you to shift down a gear.
More than a campsite.
A home.


Our former farm is located on the northern border of the Westerwald in beautiful Wisserland. The days of farming and animal husbandry are long gone. But year after year, the farm seems to be slowly getting closer to its origins.

The courtyard is equipped with a bar as a lounge, a beautiful solar shower with a view and more.

name: Association of Friends of Mallorca
description: Family pitches with electricity, water, toilet, shower, WiFi. About 3 km to Can Picafort with all shopping facilities and the 11 km long sandy beach.

name: RicaVida Eco-Wild-Regenerative Camping
description:
LOCATION: arriving by car or bike: Lisbon - Algarve, following the road IC1, after passing Ourique, and Aldeia de Palheiros, turn left onto Campo de Guerreiros. You will see the old workshop "auto peres" on your left, follow by an old road, about 3km. (please send email for full location)
By public transport you can come to Ourique with Rede Expressos (bus) , or Train to Funcheira and ask our ride here.We are in a very quiet place without cars. We have two wells with water that can use for bathing and a river that is with running water until June. The landscape is typical of the Lower Alentejo. We distant 45 minutes from the Alentejo coast's and the same from Algarve cost. We respect Harmony with Nature, so we ask you to interfere as little as possible with this place. You can camp in an area of 1 hectar. The area of the garden is very welcoming, is where is the well. If you wish you can join us at mealtimes, which are always vegetarian.

name: the orchard
description: quiet camping spot or motorhome pitch in an orchard. A walking path and mountain bike route of the dune belt runs through the plot. The plot is approximately 1 ha, located in the dune belt / high Kempen nature reserve.

name: Rosslwirt rest
description: Parking + rest not far from the beautiful Salzkammergut lakes.

name: Le domaine Petit Ville Chaud
description: Discover a quietly located campsite for campers and bus campers, in the middle of the beautiful forest. Our spacious motorhome pitch can accommodate 3 motorhomes on a lush 4000m² domain. Enjoy all the comforts with amenities such as water, electricity and discharge facilities. And after a day full of adventures in nature, relax and refresh yourself in our wonderfully heated swimming pool. Book your unforgettable forest camping experience today.

name: Le domaine Petit Ville Chaud
description: Discover a quietly located campsite for campers and bus campers, in the middle of the beautiful forest. Our spacious motorhome pitch can accommodate 3 motorhomes on a lush 4000m² domain. Enjoy all the comforts with amenities such as water, electricity and discharge facilities. And after a day full of adventures in nature, relax and refresh yourself in our wonderfully heated swimming pool. Book your unforgettable forest camping experience today.

name: Come and sleep on our estate on the Costa Vicentina
description:
Rugged coast, beautiful beaches and a characteristic hinterland with cork oaks, olive trees and cows on the field. In this landscape you experience peace, the Portuguese rural life and marvel at the beautiful skies and a grand starry sky at night. Come to our estate, a 15-minute drive from the sea.
Stay with us at Flor do Brejo and discover the Alentejo with the Costa Vicentina.

name: Camping on the Holschbacherhöhe on the edge of the Westerwald
description:
More than just a place around the campfire.
On the Holschbacherhöhe you will experience nature, relaxation and hospitality.
Between orchards, chickens, horses and a good portion of landscape,
we would like to invite you to shift down a gear.

Our former farm is located on the northern border of the Westerwald in beautiful Wisserland. The days of farming and animal husbandry are long gone. But year after year, the farm seems to be slowly getting closer to its origins.

name: Women Only Camp Space
description:
If you, as a woman alone, with a friend, mother, grandmother, aunt, sister, niece, neighbor or with your female life partner (but in all cases without children) want to spend the night peacefully in your own camping equipment with its own facilities, you can do so at our Private terrain. There is NO sanitary building (except for a solar outdoor shower) so you really have to rely on your own facilities such as a chemical toilet. Why do we choose the 'women' target group? Because as a female couple we also camp ourselves and we regularly notice that we attract attention. Sometimes other camping guests sit down and open a beer when we have to back up with our camper to reach the spot that has been assigned to us....

Single or together? That doesn't matter to us. For example, we have single friends who sometimes want to be in the middle of no-where, but don't because it doesn't always feel safe. You can do that here! No one disturbs you here, except maybe our cats who are curious and like to come around.

On our private property, you have 1000 m2 of land at your disposal. There are meadows and fields all around, so you can see for miles.
Although the camping spot consists of 1000 m2, in principle we do not allow more than 1 camping equipment, unless in consultation. Only in this way can we guarantee the peace and privacy that this place offers. If you want to come to our WOCS with someone who also has their own camping equipment, that is certainly negotiable. It is always highly recommended to contact us in advance if our camping pitch is available, in order to avoid any disappointments.... The camping pitch itself has no special planting. This was used by the previous residents as a riding arena. The bottom is therefore drained and provided with felt and on top of that a special top layer, which has now become very hard. Horse lovers know this as an "Achterberg base" especially for jumping horses. This surface is so solid that trucks and tractors can drive over it without any problems. In winter we cover the bottom with plastic and spray water on it when it freezes. This creates an ice rink of 1000m2 within 1 night, which is fun for the village children! That would no longer be possible with grass or plantings, so we do not opt for that. But there is a lot of greenery all around us, to compensate!
The furnishing is simple and the facilities are limited. There is a water tap, chute for chemical toilet and a solar shower available, there is also a 6 amp power connection available at an additional cost. In addition, there is a picnic bench and a gas barbecue that you can use.
The camping pitch is located on a large plot of land, located between Ellewoutsdijk and Driewegen in the "Zak van Zuid-Beveland" region in the beautiful province of Zeeland!

name: Green Greenhouses a stone's throw from historic Ghent
description: As the last plant nursery of a suburb of Ghent, we have managed to preserve a hidden piece of green in the advancing buildings, our greenhouses are located next to the Scheldejaagpad to Ghent center on the one hand (4km max) and the land of the Tour of Flanders - Flemish Ardennes on the other side. We also border the Liedermeersparkje with children's playground. the pitches are located next to the horse pasture that you reach via our private road... in the middle of a residential area... totally unexpected green oasis. We like to call it our city jungle. If you like nature, space and still some vibrant life.

name: Peace, space, nature & alpacas at camping 't Heidestek
description: Camping 't Heidestek is the ideal place to experience the peace, space and nature of the Frisian bocage landscape. Located between the Alde Feanen National Park and the Wadden area, there are many opportunities for excursions and cycling trips.

name: location in Poland border Germany
description:
A Franco-Polish couple, owners of land on a historic site, in the center of a small village Broniszow, 240 km from Berlin, 10 minutes from a large city,
welcomes you to our home, we are present in August.
Access to water, electricity, possible to empty your waste water, to make a washing machine.
Your pitch of 50 m2 on a closed ground of 5000m2.
Only one spot.

name: Peaceful,tranquil,beautiful,paradise.
description: A peaceful rural sanctuary. There's a small sheltered wood area, an elevated garden area with breath taking views to the sea, forest and the mountains in an aonb area and bird sanctuaries near by and a red squirrel woodland and footpaths to and along the coast.

name: Peaceful,tranquil,beautiful,paradise.
description: A peaceful rural sanctuary. There's a small sheltered wood area, an elevated garden area with breath taking views to the sea, forest and the mountains in an aonb area and bird sanctuaries near by and a red squirrel woodland and footpaths to and along the coast.

name: Camping Sous Les Étoiles Normandie
description: Discover the charm of Normandy at camping "Sous Les Etoiles", a picturesque family campsite, nestled in the welcoming village of St Martin des Besaces, Calvados. Benefit from our unique offer of camping and caravaning suitable for all ages. Our extensive camping pitches in Calvados are ideally located in a lush rural park of more than 5 hectares, offering stunning views of the green fields, and are protected by a variety of trees and hedges. Savour the melody of bird song and the wonder of a diverse fauna during your nights spent "Under the Stars". Our private and pet-friendly campsite in Normandy, is within walking distance of the village center, where a range of shops and services is available. Discover the essence of nature and the friendly atmosphere in St Martin des Besaces, a rural campsite with a view in Normandy that will make you live an unforgettable experience.

name: Camping in the heart of nature near the Gorges de l'Ardèche: Enjoy the calm of the countryside
description: Discover the Aire de Toronne, a campsite in the middle of nature located in the heart of Drôme Provençale, near the Gorges de l'Ardèche in Auvergne. Our resort offers a quiet, shaded and secure setting for large vehicles, with comfortable accommodation and plenty of outdoor activities for the whole family. Gisèle welcomes you to this former farm and its authentic century-old Mas Provençal, surrounded by a green setting ideal for relaxing and recharging your batteries. Only 1h30 from Lyon and Marseille, and 40 minutes from Avignon or Valence, our location is strategic for exploring the region. The Aire de Toronne is on the border of Ardèche, Gard and Vaucluse, with many sites to visit such as the Crocodile Farm, the Gorges de l'Ardèche, Vallon Pont d'Arc and the Caverne du Pont of Arc. Enjoy a memorable stay exploring the Drôme Provençale and its surroundings from our base ideally located for lovers of camping in the heart of nature.

name: Beautiful place 3 km from the Costa Dorada
description: Close to the idyllic fishing village of L'Ametlla de Mar you will find this beautiful motorhome with flat ground and all imaginable amenities. The view of the mountains, the beautiful sunrise, your own bbq spot. Only 2 km from the highway exit and 3 km from the beach. ideal for transit! With water, electricity, shower, toilet, washing machine, dryer and so on. there is wifi and dirty water dump. You are most welcome in our garden!

name: Unique attractive mini campsite with swimming pond, sauna, privacy and cosiness
description:
Come and enjoy our attractive mini-camping site 'Het Zomernest' where you can experience peace, space and privacy for 2 months a year (July 7 to September 3), as well as enjoy the atmosphere. Swim among the fish in our beautiful natural swimming pond and find the ultimate relaxation in our wonderful sauna with outdoor shower. At your disposal is also a spacious fire pit, a trampoline, a football field, a chicken coop with fresh eggs, an outdoor bar with coffee and tea in the morning, an indoor bar where you can enjoy a drink in the evening and a shower building. with 2 spacious showers, 2 toilets, a urinal, a combined shower & toilet and a covered washing-up area.

The grounds are park-like with many different shrubs and plants; a true paradise for many birds and butterflies. The campsite has 14 spacious camping pitches, each with its own power point, 2 of which already have a fully equipped folding trailer or camper that can be rented for a small additional charge if you do not own one yourself. Due to the small amount of camping pitches, there is a lot of space, privacy and the possibility for personal contact when desired.

There is plenty of room for entertainment for young and old on and around the site. In the evening there are marshmallows to roast in the fire pit with a view of the sunset and twice a week you can watch a nice movie in our outdoor cinema in the evening. Behind the site, a 5-minute walk away, you will find a beautiful nature reserve 'Schans de Katshaar' and there are many walking and cycling routes in the area. The nearest supermarket in Schoonebeek is 10 minutes by bike or 5 minutes by car. If you want to do something more active in the area, the old fortified town of Coevorden is also easy to reach by car. At about 10 minutes drive you will also find Plopsa Indoor and the Hutten Hoogte Center Parcs with AquaMundo and activities such as laser tag, bowling, climbing and Adventure golf as entertainment for everyone. Afterwards you can enjoy all the peace, space and nature on our site.

name: Meadow camping in the south of Bochum
description:
Camping like in nature

Welcome to Bochum! My tent and RV site for self-sufficient campers is on private property. It is paved and borders directly on a large meadow (approx. 1,000 square meters). This is very flat, ideal for camping and can be used very gladly. The maximum length for vehicles is seven meters. The entire property is almost 0.5 hectares in size. Despite the proximity to the city, the parking space is close to nature and quiet. Public transport, banks, shops, restaurants are within walking distance. The location is ideally located to discover the wider Ruhr area with all its diverse possibilities.

things to do in the area

The Weitmarer Holz (for hiking and cycling) is in the immediate vicinity and can be easily reached on foot. It is not far to the reservoir by bike, bus or your own car, where you can sail and surf. Around the lake you can inline skate, cycle and hike. In the center there is also a swimming pool with sauna and a RUB botanical garden. Visit the Bochum city center or Hattingen old town (half-timbered). Everything only about 5 km away. In Bochum there are numerous theatres, museums (e.g. mining, railways), the Bochum Symphony Orchestra, Starlight Express, the Centennial Hall, cabarets, the Bochum colliery, VfL Bochum (Ruhr Stadium), climbing halls, swimming pools, saunas, riding stables, zoos, industrial culture and dump hopping - Everything very close and very easy to reach.

We are happy to provide advice and lots of tips! Ask us!

If you have any questions in advance, please contact us via the message field in the booking request. We are happy to provide answers and solutions.
